Review.Titre: Lifetime guarantee I don't think so.
Review.Contenu: Lifetime guarantee I don't think so.The first Solo wouldn't even close properly, so they shipped me another one.But this has only lasted two years broken in very stormy winds.Lifetime guarantee?  you have to pay for shipping so how can it be free?I thought paying for a £100 umbrella would be the answer to my problems. I'm not convinced.☂️☔️🌂

Review.Titre: After a few uses the umbrella broke
Review.Contenu: After a few uses the umbrella broke.  It was repaired and after 1 use it broke.  I now use a $30 umbrella and it lasts through windy days.  Davek wouldn't survive that.

Review.Titre: Crappy quality & no unconditional lifetime warranty for Swedes it seems ...
Review.Contenu: I have bought 4 umbrellas from Davek since I like the look of them. The quality however is so so and I have replaced 3 of them since they provide what they call "Unconditional Lifetime Guarantee". Now an umbrella broke again, the 4th, and I contacted support. Now I receive the information that for some reason they do not ship replacement umbrellas to Sweden. I can buy umbrella on their website and have it shipped to Sweden, but apparently not when I excercise my "unconditional" lifetime guarantee, because then it is suddenly conditional that I do not live in Sweden. So, somehow you have to make sure that you do not live in a country to which they do not ship for some obscure reason.

Review.Titre: I paid my money and they refuse to ship…
Review.Contenu: I paid my money and they refuse to ship my order I bought two umbrellas for $150.00 every day I get a new excuse why they cant ship my order

To have to pay for return shipping AND have money taken off for the shipping to my house is ridiculous. Especially when selling $100 umbrellas. $20 just for me to find out your umbrella is not made with the quality matierals as described and not worth the previous price you are charging. You could do better.

Review.Titre: The quality of this umbrella does not live up to its claims.
Review.Contenu: The quality of this umbrella does not meet their claims. It is poor quality, hard to operate the automatic opening button, in fact does not now operate. Hardly used and now will not open. Do not buy its a waste of money. The customer service is also non existent, don't answer emails and not bothered about disatisfied customers.

Elite umbrella, used for special occasions, rarely. Looks nice. Poor quality. Spokes break, didn't even know how it happened. Twice. Have already had one replacement (cost of return and shipping was around £25). Not bothering a second time, will buy a better quality umbrella for less.

Review.Titre: I reached out in regards to the product…
Review.Contenu: I reached out in regards to the product itself and no one ever got back to me on anything. I don't feel as though product is worth $65 it's not even an automatic umbrella. I asked to return it for full refund and no one got back to me with the label how can I return it for full refund is there a way I can get a prepaid label? Thank you

Review.Titre: The quality of umbrella is below…
Review.Contenu: The quality of umbrella is below average, not worth the price. The return process is much hassle, and making it worse, Davek said I had to pay for the original shipping if I return the product. I’m not happy at all but don’t want to lose 20 dollars on shipping, so have to keep it.

I see the reviews, but sent mine right back. I paid to ship it back ($9.00) and then they deducted their shipping cost from my return ($10.00) which is noted on the return policy. So I lost $20 bucks to see thin fabric, color not as saturated as the photos, with a flimsy operating system. I guess for an umbrella more costly than most, I was expecting to "get it" when I held it. It feels like a 20$ umbrella. Very surprised.

I bought three Davek umbrellas of different sizes, and decided that the commuter size was just too small for me and I want to return it.  I looked into the return policy, and found the policy to be very unfriendly.  Other companies would autogenerate a return shipping label for me.  Your company makes us to all the work for the return, pay for return shipping, and would deduct the original shipping cost from the refund.  That is a very bad return policy and I will not order any more products from your company.  Nor would I recommend you to my friends.  A good return policy is what people looking for these days, in the age of online shopping.

Review.Titre: Bought the Duet umbrella from Davek’s…
Review.Contenu: Bought the Duet umbrella from Davek’s website before a trip to SE Asia. The first rainy day I brought it out on (literally today) I found out the umbrella has a leak in the middle of the canopy. Big drops of water drip-drip-dripping on my head while I’m trying to stay dry. For like $150 this is beyond unacceptable. I checked and they want me to pay them MORE money to SHIP it to them so they can “fix” the faulty umbrella. I’ll just buy from a better company for far less. What a scam. Don’t buy from this company, it’s all marketing and zero followthrough.
Travel umbrella impossible to open. Too hard. It then cost me $18 plus to return between what Davek  deducted and the cost of mailing it back. Extremely disappointed.

My Solo umbrella arrived last week. I checked it and it seemed okay. I then tried to use it today, for the first time as it was raining and one of the ribs broke on opening. I am very careful with my  things and so opened it as appropriate.

This umbrella was bought 3 years ago. It never really worked fully. I've only used it about five times and now it has broken completely as it won't close  really disappointed. My advice would be save your money. I could have bought a new cheaper umbrella every  year for the price of this.

Review.Titre: I bought my umbrella last year and took…
Review.Contenu: I bought my umbrella last year and took to my home in Asia I used it once for about ten minutes it open and closed fine next time, was one year later and it would not open would spring out but not lock in place and not fully open this was pretty pricey umbrella for ten minutes worth of use.

Review.Titre: I was so excited to receive my…
Review.Contenu: I was so excited to receive my umbrella, but was immediately disappointed with its inability to readily open.  I have used drug store umbrellas which work much more smoothly.
Very disappointed at their return process. I had to pay to return the umbrellas... plus they also deducted the fee for shipping it to me.

Paid £60 for the mini umbrella, I have  better and stronger umbrellas that I paid £10 for, so flimsy and underwhelming, contact customer services and was told that they are ‘supposed’ to feel flimsy,  do not waste your money and get a cheaper product from Amazon
Umbrella has a faulty open switch...it doesn't completely open when you press the button.  Very disappointed.
Umbrella is very difficult to open and  awkward. Design feels cheap. Would never recommend. Very disappointed in Denver.
The umbrella broke as soon as soon as I received it and used it the first time. I have $10 umbrellas that fared much better! I will be sending it back.

Review.Titre: I had just purchased two mini and
Review.Contenu: I had just purchased two mini and, wouldn’t you know, a day later they have a sale. Buy 2, get one free 😭. It’s my luck, not this company. It always happens to lil old me. Oh well. That’s life’s!Anyway, Can’t wait to try it. They’re on the way as I type. One is for my lil wife. I’ll write another review once I do try it. Needless to say, they look great 👍🏼

Review.Titre: The smaller one was too small
Review.Contenu: The smaller one was too small. The medium one was very heavy.Poor customer service.

Review.Titre: i returned two mini umbrellas as the…
Review.Contenu: i returned two mini umbrellas as the quality for price wasn’t as i expected, i was willing to pay the price as I expected premium quality -

Review.Titre: This is my third request for a receipt…
Review.Contenu: This is my third request for a receipt of my last purchase. Somebody has dropped the ball.

Review.Titre: I used the umbrella today for the first…
Review.Contenu: I used the umbrella today for the first time and there is a big hole in it right next to the joint !
You have fantastic marketing.  There is nothing special about your umbrellas.

Review.Titre: The worse business transaction ever! Run from Davek!
Review.Contenu: The worse business transaction ever!  I purchased an  umbrella about a month ago, and ended up receiving an old model that looked used. So, I returned it, and now the company refuses to refund me using their very well elaborated excuses. What a scam! Don’t waste your money!
Poor sent quality, replacement pictures sent …

After receiving the umbrella l learned it was smaller than expected. I thought Davey would try to help me find something for my needs but they just said send it back. After actually seeing this umbrella and comparing to others I am not convinced that it is worth the price charged. My opinion is that the inflated price is a marketing strategy to make one think they are buying something exceptional.

Very cheap quality.I bought davek mini umbrella for £50.The entire metal frame rusted in a year and the fabric also became stained with rust.I wanted to sent it for replacement and was asked ro pay £9.99 plus delivery payment (£4.80 royal mail).For that kind of money Davek should replace it for free.

First purchased the umbrella, it last almost a season in Los Angeles.  So that means a small hand full of times.  It was repaired then it made it a day.  So an expensive umbrella the has the breaks and paying shipping for both ways means the value is trash.  It looks pretty for an umbrella, but it's use is just to hang on a hook.  There are 20 dollar umbrellas that last longer and will save you so much more money in the long run

Review.Titre: They make a quality umbrella but…
Review.Contenu: They make a quality umbrella but customer service is really, really bad.  I ordered two and received one.  They would not provide another tracking number, just said that it was coming.  After almost 2 weeks and me calling again, they finally sent my second one.... and by ground.  They would not ship next day or even 2 day.  For an umbrella that cost this much, they should have better customer service.

Review.Titre: Was disappointed in the mini umbrella…
Review.Contenu: Was disappointed in the mini umbrella as you must open n close it manually.  There is no button or lever to do that    I would have thought for the price that would have been a given.  They did offer exchange for a bigger umbrella that does have a button to open n close but with shipping costs etc it was just easier to buy one at Walgreens. Their response to my emails were prompt n courteous .

My husband and I bought two for a trip to Italy last month, mine broke the 1st day I used it and my husband’s broke about 4 days later. The same thing happened to both  of us . . . a small spring popped off one of the spokes when we depressed the button to close the umbrella, causing the spoke to flop. We had to laugh that we spent so much money on them and our $5 umbrellas bought from street vendors have lasted much longer

Review.Titre: They look nice, but is a garbage product.
Review.Contenu: They look nice and have a great warranty.  However, they are not durable.  It's cheaper to buy inexpensive umbrellas, because you'll pay for shipping both ways.  I have a new umbrella that after a handful of uses break. I used the warranty and the fixed umbrella broke after 1 day of use.  Not a windy day, just open and close a few times..

Unlike the other models, the elite umbrellas are poorly build. The first one received had the tip felt off and the aluminum. Fitting pitted.  The replacement had the stitches on the leather handle cover getting loose and the seam falling apart.A Davek representative chalked it off as imperfections that customers usually don’t mine. Now I have to make a second trip to UPS to send back this POS.

I ordered the Duet, which I immediately thought, in its unopened position, was way to too heavy and bulky. I have been unable to reach Davek by phone (it appears that there is no customer service phone number) to discuss a possible exchange for a different model. It seems that my only option is to return it within 30 days, dated from the order date. It took about 6 days to get it, and my view is it should be dated from the delivery date, not the order date. Please reply ASAP.

Review.Titre: It was way too heavy and bulky and that…
Review.Contenu: It was way too heavy and bulky and that is why I ordered the travel version. At that cost I thought there could have been better a design and materials used. I will keep it at home for use around the neighborhood or to leave in the car so I can test how durable it is in any event, but there is no way that I will be able to commute or travel with it.

Review.Titre: Umbrella I received was smaller than I…
Review.Contenu: Umbrella I received was smaller than I expected. I contacted customer support to potentially swap my umbrella for bigger, more expensive model, but they never got back to me (10 days and counting). Umbrella certainly looks like a good quality, but it does not really matter if it gets my backpack wet. Also, non-existent customer service is a great concern, especially for such price.

i purchased 3 mini umbrellas, and one already broke.  The thread holding the fabric to the skeleton broke.  i have had it for only 2 weeks and it hasn't even rained yet.  a little dissapointed in the quality for the high price i paid.  i am sure the full size umbrellas are built better, but quality shouldn't be compromised because its a "mini".  i know there is a life time warranty, but now i have to jump through hoops to take care of it.

The mini umbrella I ordered arrived broken - it wouldn’t open or close properly.  Then because we wanted a refund in lieu of exchanging it, Davek made us pay for the return shipping.  Product quality and customer fall woefully short for a company that supposedly prides itself on both.  Never again and I will share my experience with as many people as I can.

Review.Titre: I have read reviews by a few customers…
Review.Contenu: I have read reviews by a few customers who made complaints and I’m sure they received just compensation. That said, I have two, a single and a double; they have done exactly what they were advertised to do and they did it well . It didn’t turn inside out in the wind and it has kept my butt dry when raining. Thank you for a great product.

Review.Titre: It has nothing to do with your product
Review.Contenu: It has nothing to do with your product.  I never recieved it.  It got lost in ups.  I have lodged a complaint.  If unresolved in a couple weeks i will order again and request alternative delivery option.  I am never home during ups delivery and just dropping by without proof of delivery (signed receipt) doesnt work in my case.  I am certain you have a good product, otherwise i wouldnt consider orderinh it again.

The actual fabric is nice and they shipped it quickly but for the price I paid I would not have expected the handle to have areas where the coating was incomplete and not properly sealed onto the wood.  I probably should have gone with a more established company for a gentleman’s umbrella like Fox.

I ordered my umbrella from  an ad that popped up in my NY Times reading. Thought I would splurge on a really GOOD umbrella even though I live in California.  It arrived wrapped in gold gift paperwhich I did not request.  The handle was too heavy and there was a clip very awkward  to get my small hand around.  It didn’t fully open the one time I tried it.  I returned it and had to pay the $20.00 postage myself.    Forget the gold paper give good customer service and describe more accurately your product.

Very disappointed, the umbrella was heavy and poorly constructed. The retaining catch broke within half a dozen uses, so it kept trying to spring open. Shortly after on a mildly breezy day one of the arms bent completely out of shape. It went in the first available bin.

I need to return them.  They will not click up and stay up.  I was going to use them as gifts but tried them all.  You have to keep playing with them to catch the lock at the top to stay opened.  Probably should look into your next size up.  These are not strong enough and do not catch.

Review.Titre: I was very unhappy with my purchase
Review.Contenu: I was very unhappy with my purchase.  I was standing in the rain and wind at the train station fighting with my inverted umbrella in front of the doctors and lawyers who are also my clients that I would recommend this umbrella to.  A bad experience for me and poor marketing for them

Review.Titre: I have not received my umbrellas
Review.Contenu: I have not received my umbrellas. I got notice that the order was received, and even that it had shipped over a week ago. There was no tracking information provided, so I sent an email inquiring where my umbrellas were. I have received no response, and the umbrellas are still not here.

Review.Titre: Good product but only marketed to USA customers.
Review.Contenu: Was after a new, strong but lightweight travel umbrella to compliment my Helinox hiking umbrella. This Davek Solo umbrella was just advertised on my news feed/website here in Australia and looked great! Perfect! BUT - Unfortunately everything was only in inches/ounzes which means nothing to us in Australia (and rest of the world) - why not simply quote both metric and imperial sizes/weights together? Tried to send an enquiry email through the Davek website for further info. but the 'Contact' link only directs/links me to a Twitter feed!!! (I don't have) What happened to basic email? You lost another customer here. Basic stuff - sheesh.

Review.Titre: Loudly QC and lousier customer service
Review.Contenu: I purchased 9 umbrellas from you before and all went well but one.  The customer service was just outrageous. When I received a long umbrella elite - it came with an aluminum part all pitted.  I called to have it replaced. The replacement had the leather on the handle splitting at the seam. When I called again,  I was told they would prefer to refund me as I was too picky.  I explained that you send two defective items and complained about their ineffective QC.  The representative told me off saying there is always slips with QC.  So much for the image of quality Davek is trying to impress their clients.

Umbrella broke in 8 months. Under the customer protection laws of the European Union, the umbrella has to be replaced free of charge. Completely free of charge, no processing costs. Davek customer support didn't answer my inquiries until being threatened with legal action. Once I finally managed to send the package back, it was returned to me as undeliverable. Delivery cost itself was still on me, enough for two conventional umbrellas.  This company is absolutely NOT interested in caring for its products or customers. Should have believed the negative reviews.

Review.Titre: I purchased 2 TRAVELERs models and they…
Review.Contenu: I purchased 2 TRAVELERs models and they both broke within 2 months of use.I sent out both for repairs, and one of them broke again in 2 weeks of light use.I will not bother sending in for repairs again, and strongly recommend not to buy these junks.

Heap of rubbish , first one returned for repairs after 3 months , freight at our cost ,could have purchased another couple of cheap umbrellas for the cost, just put repaired umbrella in the bin , not worth the money and frustration.

Review.Titre: Mini umbrella was horrible and useless
Review.Contenu: Mini umbrella was horrible and extremely difficult to open all the way. I didn’t even have the energy to send it back and literally threw a $50.00 purchase in the garbage. Would never buy from them again and will stick with Blunt umbrellas.

The umbrella has been scratched and falling apart on its own since I bought it.  Customer service seems unwilling to help.  This is uncharasteristic of other overly priced products on the market.  Would not recommend this product to anyone.

Unfortunately for me, it broke on its second use.  One of the ribs would not close.  I know there's a lifetime guarantee. Haven't yet decided whether paying for the shipping both ways and sending it in for repair is worth the effort.

Review.Titre: I bought my two umbrella about over a…
Review.Contenu: I bought my two umbrella about over a year ago and one already broke. I called the company and the person who answered the phone cared less. I have not even used my second umbrella yet. I am very disappointed at your service.Massoud Pourzamani

Sent me the wrong color, I did not ask for Black I asked for Plum.  The enclosed packing slip was even initialed by someone showing they had checked my order.  How about hiring some people who can get the color right.  It cannot be that difficult.

Good umbrella, but the bluetooth doesn't work well and has sent me probably 100 notifications over two days, none of which have been accurate or useful.Not worth 130 bucks. Contacted Davek about it and the best they offered was to return it.

Review.Titre: Don't bother - Not a great umbrella, slow shipping, no customer service, returns cost shipping + $10 "restocking fee"
Review.Contenu: I ordered two umbrellas a week before Christmas (Davek Mini and Davek Traveler). They didn't arrive until the end of January. When they arrived, both were flimsy and certainly not worth the price. My mom's $20 Eddie Bauer umbrella is far sturdier. I returned both (I had to pay shipping AND a $10 restocking fee). When I contacted customer support to request the restocking fee be waived for slow shipping and poor quality, they did not respond. So frustrating. I also wonder why all the people here got invitations to write a review, when I didn't. Looks like Davek is good at guessing who's happy and who's not.

Bought two umbrellas one for me, one for my wife.Mine works OK but the mechanism in my wife`s failedon the second use. Davek`s replacement guarantee is rubbish in my opinionsent several emails and no much as a reply.Beware

Review.Titre: My umbrella broke in less than a year
Review.Contenu: My umbrella broke in less than a year, and then the company wanted me to pay shipping to turn it back in and receive a replacement back. Not going to sink any more money into this company. Umbrella is heavy and unwieldy. Not worth the price and the service is lacking.Response to Davek: I don't think you understand my concern regarding cost and timing of shipping, quality, and your lack of a direct response. Now during the rainy spring, I'll be without an umbrella for an indefinite period of time. The "guarantee" does not seem to really satisfy needs. All of this less than a year into what was supposed to be a high quality umbrella.

Incredibly disappointed in the performance of this product. We have very mild winters in Adelaide. First time I used it in inclement weather it failed dismally.  This is why I am cautious to purchase high end products online. Could have purchased something similar at half the price and return process so much easier and cost effective, but unfortunately got taken in by the hyped marketing. Temporary replacement umbrella $20 (survived the same weather well + $15 freight $10 postage adds $45 to the joy of my experience of Built to Endure life's storms! Unconditionally Guaranteed for life! Engineered to Perfection! We think it's better to buy one high-quality product that will last for many years, than an endless stream of replacements! Blah Blah Blah Blah!

Review.Titre: Flimsy, bad quality for a $139 CAD umbrella
Review.Contenu: I bought the Davek Solo in Dec 2016, and being in the super rainy Vancouver I must say I am pretty disappointed in this umbrella.  For the past 5 years I had to send in my umbrella for repair pretty much 1-2 times a year.  The spoke design seems to be pretty weak as it breaks pretty easily.  While it has a lifetime warranty, I had to pay for shipping for the past 6 repairs which had already cost me the amount equivalent to the price of a brand new Solo by now.  For an umbrella this expensive, I'd expect much stronger framework and not something so flimsy, easy-to-break, poor quality like this umbrella.  Another spoke on the Solo umbrella just broke on me again today - but I am not going to spend more money on this anymore.  I will just get another brand that will last me much longer than Davek Solo.

Review.Titre: I am very disappointed by both the…
Review.Contenu: I am very disappointed by both the product and the company’s customer service.  After just 15 months of vey light use which excluded usage in any type of windy conditions, my umbrella has developed a malfunction with one of its spokes.  I have had umbrellas a fourth of the price which have lasted for years - so much for Davek claim that you will only ever need to buy one umbrella.What adds insult to injury is the fact that their customer service wants me to pay for shipping to them and back before they even take a look at it.  I suggest they should look at Amazon and how they treat their customers.  Needless to say I will be spreading the word about them in anyway I can for the way they have treated me.

Review.Titre: Just throwing away our second Davek…
Review.Contenu: Just throwing away our second Davek umbrella. NOT IMPRESSED!! The first one I could not close easily!! And you want to be able to close an umbreall quickly and easily when entering a building or a car - not struggle with it - pushing and pushing, trying to get it closed - and getting wet in the process as having to hold the umbrella down to be able to use more force to finally get it closed. And I am a fit and strong woman!! Davek replaced that umbrella and the new one, using it the second or third time, one of the ribs broke. And no, I am not a person that is hard on things. I take care of my belongings. My daughter also bought a Davek umbrella and she also had to return hers for a replacement due to a fault with a rib.So - NOT IMPRESSED!!

Very rude, unresponsive, uninterested, unhelpful customer service over the phone. Defective item received. More than a hassle than I ever expected! Will never recommend DavekNY to anyone based on my experience.

This is my second Davek umbrella. The first time I used both umbrellas, they broke. These are very poorly made. Umbrellas I have purchased on the street for $10 have lasted longer. Do not waste your money!

Followed instructions, even bought new battery in hopes the one in phone was bad, and still couldn't get green light to blink and phone to recognize umbrella. I sent two emails to support and no reply or phone call.

Review.Titre: We just receive the Davek Umbrellas we…
Review.Contenu: We just receive the Davek Umbrellas we cannot review as we haven't use them, therefore we cannot review.  As of this writing we cannot render an opinion. Check back with us.AM

Review.Titre: I really did not like the umbrella…
Review.Contenu: I really did not like the umbrella design.It is almost exactly the same as my $20 umbrella and does not offer much more for the massive price difference. I will be returning my order.

Review.Titre: I would love to write a 5 star review…
Review.Contenu: I would love to write a 5 star review but unfortunately my umbrella never worked Doesn’t go up or down with buttonI run around with it up as far as it will goMakes me so sad 😞
I specifically clicked OFF notifications and the company still sent me some. This sort of scarcity mindset is sad. When a client clicks off further notifications - DON'T send any.

Review.Titre: Two umbrellas, both broken. Not worth the investment at all.
Review.Contenu: Two umbrellas, both broken, Davek is definitely not worth the investment.I'm an Aussie, I live in a country in the middle of one of the worst droughts we've ever seen, so I haven't had to use my umbrella much since I purchased it. Regardless, my mother and I both purchased Davek umbrellas at the same time, and my mum's umbrella has broken twice and had to be replaced, which is covered by their warranty, however you have to pay to ship the umbrella to Davek and then PAY AGAIN for them to post one back to you.Mine has now broken too. Within a month of my mum's umbrella breaking FOR THE SECOND TIME. If I bother to pay postage both ways to get a replacement, I'll definitely be selling mine and purchasing another umbrella. One that I can rely on the handful of times it rains in Sydney.

Review.Titre: Davek just qualified as junk umbrella club
Review.Contenu: Bought the Duet & Solo combo costs me $223+ excluding overseas shipping.  Was happy with such well-made umbrellas compared to those China-junks.  Well guess what, the Duet umbrella frame broken off less than 6 months!  For no apparent reasons, no thunderstorms, no winds, it just decided to break.  Rather than sending this junk back, I have to figure out how to sew it back (not sure Davek will even honor overseas shipments).   Perhaps I have to say some prayers to the Solo, caress it, and hope for mercy and deliverance.  Well Davek, congratulations in joining the Low quality junk club!UPDATE:  If you honor overseas warranty / return, then let’s talk.  I’d also question as to why it failed within 6 months.  Otherwise, big mouth with big claims just wouldn’t help to begin with.  Downgraded to 1 star.

I am extremely disappointed with the Davek traveller. It has now broken in the same spot twice. Once on the original umbrella, and once on the replacement. This is after minimal use, and no abuse. Both times have been while I have been traveling, as this is why I bought the umbrella. The gauge of the pressed metal spars is too thin. The spring tension wire exerts too much force where it passes through the spar. Consequently the spar bends, then work hardens and breaks.I would not recommend anyone buy the Davek traveller. the postage payable to replace the umbrella is unsustainable, particularly considering the premium price paid. I hope davek reengineer this product.Update- davekny responded immediately to assist. I cannot fault the US office customer service. Time will tell if this replacement will break the same way.

Review.Titre: Broke on first time in light wind
Review.Contenu: First outing with light wind. Not only did the umbrella go inside out, but one of the spokes snapped.  I feel like I've been duped by very effective marketing.
Warranty is bluff: you have to pay 10 pounds plus shipping to repair, from Finland it is 25 pounds. For that price, I can buy another better make in Finland.
Haven’t received yet. No information about when it’s coming. No tracking number. Wouldn’t buy again from site regardless of how great the umbrella is.

Review.Titre: Quality looking materials but breaks consistently
Review.Contenu: These umbrellas look and feel great initially. The leather wrapped metal handle is weighty and has a quality feel to it. One immediately noticeable downside to the design is how bulky it is when folded (some other brands fold to an even slim column, but these umbrellas "poof" out around the velcro clasp quite a bit). Unfortunately I've owned three Davek umbrellas, and all of them have broken after a few months of use. The metal pieces in the mechanism become damaged and the umbrella won't properly open or close without manual adjustment each time. The velcro stitching on all three of my umbrellas has also come undone (leaving the velcro hanging by the stitching on one side. I have never experienced these issues with much cheaper brands of umbrellas. While there is a lifetime warranty, you have to pay for shipping plus an additional $10 for return shipping, and I'd much rather have an umbrella that doesn't break in the first place.

Terrible customer service!!!!!  I bought the solo and upon receiving it I found it to be too small of a canopy that would not sufficiently protect me. Contacted them and found out I would have to pay for the return shipping, unlike other companies I’ve dealt with that send return labels. I had them send the one for 2 as a replacement which obviously cost me more. So far with the cost of the umbrella $159 and over $12 shipping I’ve spent a good amount. While waiting for this umbrella I read many reviews of the most highly rated umbrellas and in most did not see any Davek umbrellas in the top with the exception of the elite appearing in one article but not at the top. I contacted the company to discuss returning mine for the elite but requesting free return shipping since I’ve already spent enough. The woman was very rude and had an angered tone, stating they have already spent too much shipping 2 umbrellas to me for free. This in a day when many companies ship for free and send return free shipping labels.  I am truly disgusted with this interaction. Save yourself some $ and read up on the best umbrellas which mainly includes umbrellas at a much lower price

I bought the Davek Solo a few months ago. I was looking for a good-quality umbrella that would last a long time and decided to invest in a Davek after seeing all the positive reviews saying that Davek umbrellas are the best. I used my Davek for the first time last week. The reason I hadn't used it yet is because it doesn't rain much where I live. The umbrella seemed very well-built and sturdy so I was very excited to use it. To put it slightly, the umbrella didn't live up to my expectations at all. It felt really cheap (the fabric part). It was also a little windy that day and and I had trouble balancing the umbrella; it felt like it was going to fly away. It is was not THAT windy, not at all. The umbrella looked and felt very sturdy laying around my room, but when when push comes to shove, it is pretty useless and unreliable. I am utterly disappointed and wish I had just a bought a cheap one as I am pretty sure it would've performed way better.

Review.Titre: The umbrella is the right size for…
Review.Contenu: The umbrella is the right size for carrying in one's purse, but it is much too heavy to carry anywhere.  I sent it back immediately.

Review.Titre: It broke on my first use of it
Review.Contenu: It broke on my first use of it, I went to close and one of the arms snapped off making it unusable. Very dissapointed.

Review.Titre: My order was placed about a month ago…
Review.Contenu: My order was placed about a month ago and I have not received the item nor any indication as to when it will be delivered

Review.Titre: Was disappointed at the quality for the…
Review.Contenu: Was disappointed at the quality for the price and no auto opener. Opening it manually was difficult. Returning both.

This is basically a rebranded Totes umbrella with a carbon fiber (or similar) tip rather than the standard aluminum.It doesn't open fully without a shake, and even when open, any wind will cause it to start collapsing, or flip inside-out.The first real rain I took this out it tonight, it flipped inside out, and now several of the arms are bent. Would not recommend, even at a $50 price point, much less at a $150 price point.Also, the handle looks fancy and all, but is very uncomfortable to hold. The wrist strap is too small for any practical use; it'll just catch you as you're trying to put the umbrella away.When I initially bought this, I'd emailed DavekNY about my concerns about the similarity to the Totes umbrellas (right down to the "ENSON-D4" stamps on the aluminum arms), but they refused to provide any evidence that these were not just some mass-produce junk that they rebranded and swapped out the handles on. I decided to hold off on writing a review until I'd used it in the rain. Now that I have, I'm confident speaking about it.The one thing I give it credit for, is looking pretty. It's aesthetically rather nice.

I got this umbrella as I read online that is was one of the 'best' brands. I paid $149 for this umbrella. I figured the price may just be worth it as it may not break. First use I pulled it out and was impressed. I liked how it opened and closed with the button. Looked very fancy with all the packaging. I used it for at least an hour and the medal hinge became undone. I saw a loose bolt pop out and figured I could try to fix it. Next thing I know a rope on the pole itself appeared and I could no longer open the umbrella properly. I would have to hold the top in order for it to hold up. I did NOT do anything out of the normal. For all that money I paid--I was like "really?" I got angry. I landed up shipping it back and wanting a refund. It costs me $17 to ship back which I don't think I should pay for since it broke. Davek should provide a free shipping tag to return.  What a total bummer. This umbrella is probably made with cheap parts.  With all that happened to me....I wouldn't recommend any umbrella from this company.
Terrible customer service, paid money to return a faulty product, emailed, messenger no respinse at all
Not worth the price. Didn’t want to send a bad review, but since YOU forced the issue, that’s what you get.

Review.Titre: Bought the mini umbrellas for my three…
Review.Contenu: Bought the mini umbrellas for my three grandkids of school age. One was broken and useless within two days.
Very heavy for an umbrella. Plus mine broke after less than two weeks with minimal use. So disappointed

Review.Titre: Be very sceptical of the slick sales …
Review.Contenu: Be very sceptical of the slick sales and claims made by this company.Davek has poor customer service once they sell you their product.After purchasing two solo's and two minis (the minis are of poor manufacturing quality and difficult to close once opened) I tried to return to get a swap using my replacement card, I was advised that the cards are not valid in Australia, fortunately I was later on a family holiday in San Francisco and also advised by a number of department stores there that they would not honor the replacement card guarantee, one store assistant advised perhaps you will have more luck in a store in New York? My conclusion is that the replacement card is a marketing gimmick and gives the customer nothing.Additionally I constantly receive promotional emails from Davek with discounts for products I'm not interested in, however when I tried to make a purchase was told this product was at full retail price and "unfortunately we are not running a promotion on Traveler model at this time" My conclusion from dealing with Davek is that Davek does not value it's customers, does not honor it's manufactured product guarantees and once it makes a sale it has no interest in you.

Review.Titre: Didn't arrive as promised before my…
Review.Contenu: Didn't arrive as promised before my trip. .Dont need anymore. Will return when I get home.

Review.Titre: I haven't received my order placed on …
Review.Contenu: I haven't received my order placed on May 25, 2017, so asking for a review is a bit premature.

Review.Titre: My Davek Umbrella broke the first time…
Review.Contenu: My Davek Umbrella broke the first time I opened it. Waiting to hear back about a replacement:(

Review.Titre: The umbrella is heavy and smaller than…
Review.Contenu: The umbrella is heavy and smaller than I expected.(not the mini).It is hard to pull down to lock when closingand the folds are hard to put together neatly.A very nice color though.

An great value proposition on paper, but lackluster product and subpar customer service.I think the concept of having an high quality umbrella with a lifetime guarantee and loss protection is great, it is what brought my interest in the product in the first place. (I have never used the loss protection so cannot speak on that to be fair)I have purchased the Solo, but have had multiple issues with frames bending after a short period of use.After the first replacement, I have notice a frames not extending out fully, which after - few uses got progressively worse and had to send it in again for repair. When I received the second pair, it also had the similar issues which later evolved into an unusable umbrella. To be fair, the second replacement at this moment is still usable.I have reached out to customer service to express my concern, but they genuinely seem to not care, and said that is the normal range of motion. Maybe they are right, I will give them the benefit of the doubt, but so many issues on what they advertise as a premium umbrella should not be occurring so often.I do have the mini as well, and that has worked great for years, so my advice is the following:1. Do not buy the Solo —— if you look online other people have had issues as well. (The mini works great as a backup/emergency umbrella would recommend that one if you need a backup umbrella) 2. Do not expect much from customer service.Fees for shipping and replacement/repairs do add up, so I will see how the second replacement goes, but I will not be purchasing from them or be asking for further repair. (Update: I have realized I reviewed them a few years back as well. Going back for a repair given my poor experience, that was on me, my fault. Never again.)
Umbrella was hard to close, returned it.  I had to pay $12 for return shipping AND a ~$10 restocking fee.  Not a great returns process for what is trying to be a higher end brand.

Last year I took a video and sent it to Davek that showed how the umbrella, a Davek Duet, would not open after hitting the release button. They were responsive and quickly replaced it. The replacement, however, buckles with a bit of wind. Specifically, the spines continually turn inside out with just about any gust of wind. This umbrella is not ideal for windy conditions, and I am unfortunately 0-2 with this model.

Review.Titre: I recently purchased the mini as I…
Review.Contenu: I recently purchased the mini as I wanted a sturdy umbrella to take with me in my smaller handbags. I’ve just received it (the shipping seemed to take a while) and I feel really let down by the presentation. It came wrapped in a bit of flimsy bubble wrap with a blurry invoice that looked like a child had printed it off. When I’ve spent £55 on an umbrella, I’d expect it to come in a nice little box or something at least! But instead, at first glance, it looked like something you’d get from Shein. I haven’t used it yet so can’t comment on the quality but so far, I’m pretty disappointed.

Review.Titre: Not quite the quality I expected
Review.Contenu: The Mini retails for about $60. I got the umbrella at $39. It doesn't feel like a quality umbrella. I had bought a Temella brand at around $20 and it's quality feels better than The Davek Mini.

I received the traveler as a gift. It broke in some wind the third time I used it, which surprised me as they are supposed to withstand wind. I contacted the company about a repair and I have to pay to ship it back to them, and pay £9.99 for the shipping back to me. I am not very impressed given the price of the umbrellas, and business usually pay shipping in these situations.

Review.Titre: Extremely overpriced and not any more…
Review.Contenu: It is a nice looking umbrella, but extremely overpriced and not any more durable than your average decent umbrella.  Have purchased the solo and commuter and have already had to send one back to get fixed.   I now have one with a couple of the arms bent due to wind, and tie of umbrella to the arm broke, and the other doesnt fully open to the locked position.  While it is nice to have it fixed for free, but I have to pay for shipping each time, and take the time and trouble to ship it back, which is a pain and which adds even more to the cost of an overpriced umbrella.  So, I give up and will not ship them back again.  Will throw them away and stick with your average priced umbrella from Totes or other company. Much cheaper, even in the long run having to buy multiple average priced umbrellas.  Do not recommend Davek and will not buy again.  They package a nice looking umbrella with the same basic durability of your average umbrella and charge a fortune for it, trying to make it look very upscale, but in the end, the lack of durability makes it a fail.

The umbrella seems flimsy.  It's  hard to open.  I bought the little portable one, so maybe the larger ones are more sturdy.  But this expensive little umbrella doesn't seem much better than the ones for $19.99.

Review.Titre: The canopy is too small and the…
Review.Contenu: The canopy is too small and the umbrella too heavy.
It honestly feels so flimsy for the price I paid. I haven’t gotten a chance to use it yet, but I don’t think it will work for me in windy rain.

Review.Titre: I thought this would be very…
Review.Contenu: I thought this would be very different..it isn’t. I could have bought one for a fifth of the price at T.J.MAXX that I like jus as well

Review.Titre: This umbrella is not as advertised I do…
Review.Contenu: This umbrella is not as advertised I do not think it will last in a wind and rain storm. For the $$ not worth it.

Received my umbrella, tried it out and would not close, automatically. Fresh out of the box! Wrote to customer support and they ask that I provide "video" proof of my problem!!! Really, I paid $150 for it and want it to work properly out of the box! I trust you to send a quality working product, but you don't trust your customer? This is my 2nd umbrella!

Review.Titre: I wanted to love this umbrella
Review.Contenu: I wanted to love this umbrella, but I just can't. I know it's the lowest end of their umbrellas. I bought it because it's small and I wanted to take it to Europe. The quality is less than desirable. I paid extra for an umbrella that I thought would stand the test of time. This umbrella isn't it. Maybe the bigger ones are better quality.

The product is amazing.  UPS stinks.  They should get a new delivery service.  UPS has bee telling me for three days they are going to deliver.  At the end of the day they send out a note stating the package was delayed.  I waited all day and then UPS does not deliver.  I think they should just go ahead and add the "S" into their name "USPS".

Review.Titre: We want this umbrella to be the last…
Review.Contenu: We want this umbrella to be the last umbrella you will ever need - however you can't get the color you have ordered and paid for so awful experience so far, do you really want to own an umbrella for that long if it is not in your chosen color? just hope the experience of owning the umbrella is better than Davek ordering / purchase process.

Hi; Sorry for the 2 stars, but I'm not able to rate the actual umbrella yet, as it hasn't arrived. I placed my order on 4/7, got a UPS notification that it shipped on 4/12, and it's supposed to be here tomorrow on 4/19. The whole process seems pretty slow to me, especially since it's raining hard outside right now, and I would have loved to have been able to use it today.

I got the Solo umbrella mainly because of the size and the closing mechanism, it also looks good and the fabric feels nice...BUT is not very sturdy, it wobbles a lot with light wind gusts and turns upside down very easily; my wife's $20 umbrella handles wind so much better than my $150 Davek.

Review.Titre: The buckle on the bag is awful
Review.Contenu: The buckle on the bag is awful. You can't open or close it while you are wearing the bag. To open the buckle, you have to take the bag off and approach it from the front. The mechanism is concealed by the flap of the bag. Reach under the flap to grab the sides of the lock, squeeze the lock, and pull. To close the buckle, do the same. No way at all to accomplish this while wearing the bag. The bag is also extremely heavy, even with nothing in it. In short, it's beautifully designed and looks great, but impossible to use.

Review.Titre: The umbrella is well made and…
Review.Contenu: The umbrella is well made and definitely quality.  However, it is not a $150 umbrella.  I will be returning it before the 30 days are up.Davek service was really good when I called to return the product.  Refund was extremely prompt less the shipping cost which I knew when I bought the umbrella.

I surprised my daughter in law with this umbrella knowing how well they are built but then she received it broken. They are replacing it but now I have doubts how well they are made. I was so excited that I was able to give her something very special but the excitement turned to disappointment

Review.Titre: I thought this was going to be an…
Review.Contenu: I thought this was going to be an automatic open and shut umbrella. It's cheap and difficult to open. I like my Totes much better. I paid less money for my Totes and it's a far superior product. I'll eat this one but it's the last one.

Review.Titre: just another umbrella if the app doesn’t work
Review.Contenu: Have had this for only 3 months. Good umbrella but the loss alert app stopped working. Still waiting for a response from customer support. Major feature of the umbrella is worthless without a functioning app. My Weatherman umbrella is more reliable after 2 years.

I liked the idea when I purchased the umbrella that I could get a new one if I lost it. But it turns out, with only a 25% discount and the cost of shipping, the replacement was almost as much as the original. I've now paid almost $100 for my little umbrella. Waste of money.

Review.Titre: My umbrella arrived with a black dirt…
Review.Contenu: My umbrella arrived with a black dirt mark on the side.  Since I am about to leave the country and don't have time to return it, I will keep it, but I am disappointed.  Also it is bulkier than I expected, and does not fit easily in the cover.

I expected the mini to have a little more substance, but it feels like one gust of wind will tear it apart. It's also REALLY small, better suited to a dash from the car than actual use. The price is ridiculous for what you get.

I am annoyed by the fact that they did not give me the 10% discount promised on the web page for a first order because I bought a package of two umbrellas. The offer was not conditional and these umbrellas are expensive. Seems like a bait and switch.

After submitting my  totally honest and truthful review, I now see so many additional, obviously quickly written, contrived reviews trying to offset my review, as well as other truthful reviews.Be smart enough to see thru these contrived reviews. Clearly, this $100 umbrella is a total rip-off for this price. There is an umbrella available on Amazon for $21+ that's every bit as good as Davek's "Solo". Don't be duped here. This product is flat out NOT worth $100!Sure, it was delivered quickly and when I called Davek with questions (such as where it was actually manufactured (China, by the way) there was no problems whatsoever.

I bought the smallest umbrella in January for keeping in my handbag. It certainly is small and light, but obviously that means the quality suffers. I have used it a handful of times, and unfortunately a small screw in the spokes broke off. This is when I discovered the drawbacks of a “lifetime” guarantee. I have to pay for postage to send it for repair and also enclose postage of £9.99 to have it returned to me. Considering how quickly it broke this time, I can imagine quickly spending more than it cost in the first place to have it repaired. In my opinion it has lasted such a short time that Davek should at the very least be paying for postage. In my opinion it’s not fit for purpose. So no, I won’t be returning it and will have to put it down to a costly mistake.

I'm rating the umbrella, itself -- not the experience.  The Customer Service experience was excellent.  The Umbrella itself was not very functional for the money.  I will keep it but, based on this umbrella, I would not order another one from them.  I think that for the money, my umbrella should have at least an automatic close and open button but instead, the umbrella opens and closes manually.  So, I was disappointed in the quality.  I like the size because I travel a lot and wanted something small for my suitcase -- I'm a flight attendant and space is important.  But I really wanted something with an automatic open and close feature on it.  Thanks!  Hope this helps.

The Davek products are great BUT I paid nearly $50 on an $850 order on Thursday for 2-Day air delivery but did not receive my order until the next Tuesday (5 days after irdering) and yet I received no refund of my $50!

Definitely overpriced I purchased the mini I admit I should have researched it more it is simply way too small a coverage and heavy at that. I did not realise it was a manual mechanism again at that price I just assumed it was auto pop up.Update : I am quite shocked at receiving an email indicating my above review was removed because of what I stated above  which is the truth and which I still stand by a year later it is sad that this umbrella company can “bully” Trustpilot to remove my comments which is of course only “my opinion” I am sinply amazed 😓🙁.In terms of service well my experience is only online but the website appeared user friendly and the parcel arrived in a timely fashion.

Slow delivery of product - 10 days and not due until tomorrow. By far the slowest product delivered this holiday season. It would be wise for Davek to send their opinion poll after their product arrives.
This was a gift for my wife, a daily commuter. The shipping was great, very quick. Unfortunately the coverage the umbrella provides is really too small.  I'll need to figure out what to do next.

Review.Titre: I loved the idea of this
Review.Contenu: I loved the idea of this. I do use Tile which works for me. However, with the Davek locator, I can be in the car with my umbrella in my tote right next to me & my phone is constantly notifying me that my umbrella is lost, then it's found, lost, then found. If indoors, it might not be so distracting, but while driving, it does become a distraction. I suppose I can turn off the connection until I get out of the car & turn it on when I've opened the umbrella for the rain, but, if I forget, the device doesn't service its purpose. I'm confused as to what's best to make this work for me. Please help with suggestions. Between the ones I've purchased & the ones I inherited from my mother, I must have 8 Davek umbrellas & wouldn't want to use any one of them. Thanks. Nancy

I purchased 2 traveler umbrella, one for my girlfriend and for myself. I found them to be beautifuly made. Within 6 months, both umbrellas were damaged beyond repair. The culprit is the very weak material used for the ribs. I have analyzed the damages. One rib was twisted and bent like a pretzel. I could not believe how thin the metal was. One rib was separated from the joint that folds. Lastly, one rib just snapped off, as if the metal was cut in half with a sharp knife. Due to the cost of the umbrellas, we have been very careful using them. I have spent over $250 having 2 of them shipped to me in Thailand from Japan, believing these will last for years. I am very disappointed and I will not purchase this model again. Davek definitely needs to use much stronger metal for the ribs.
The umbrella color is beautiful, but the mechanics and size is insufficient and feel cheap. Nothing about this umbrella was cheap. Always wanted a Davek, but was disappointed. Sorry.

Review.Titre: I am not satisfied with product
Review.Contenu: I am pretty upset about this product. I got the travel size Davek Umbrella in March paid $150 (worth around $180ish) and my umbrella was broken within a couple of months (I hadn't used it much but only kept in in my handbag unused in it's case. One day I opened my umbrella when I needed to use it and noticed it was broken all of a sudden! I kept the warranty card for the umbrella and emailed through to the team and they sent me another one.. Well this other one they sent me is also broken now and I swear that I do not do anything out of ordinary with them! So I do not recommend buying these umbrellas and I do not think they are the quality that they advertise to be! It makes me upset as all I want is a decent umbrella that doesn't go upside down in the wind and this one did so and also broke at the metal bits.

Review.Titre: Wrong Color - Zero Customer Service - No Response
Review.Contenu: I emailed nearly immediately after ordering asking for a different color (within 5 minutes). No response. Wrong color umbrella. Great product, but the buying experience sucked.

Review.Titre: On the first use a gust of wind caused…
Review.Contenu: On the first use a gust of wind caused the unbrella to turn over and one of the branches broke. I wrote to the company and sent photos and I never got an answer. So bad...

Review.Titre: The new umbrella I received does not…Too Much
Review.Contenu: The new umbrella I received does not work. I have to pay both ways to receive a new second umbrella. This company advertises in the Times, and yet it does not work.

Review.Titre: Great umbrella. Until it’s not....buyer be informed
Review.Contenu: I have ordered and used or gifted two Davek umbrellas in three years and both have proven just as unreliable as any umbrella you'd buy on the street at the beginning of a rainstorm in NYC. Each have, remarkably, had a broken rib within a year of modest and responsible use in addition to problems with details such as hanger loop breaking off after zero use and decorative bits popping out. I have to say that their claims of quality and durability should come with qualifications. Their policy of replacement once you pay them postage, pack your broken umbrella and return it was made good on in a timely manner, however, and Dave K was concerned about this review to a point that he emailed me twice during the return process. The replacement umbrellas appear to conform with the quality of the original purchases. This is one way to provide a guarantee though time will tell if further returns and their accompanying inconvenience are required.
The umbrella is very cheaply constructed and it jams.The clip to lower it CUT MY FINGER.Gee. Other than that, the blue color is not red!
I ordered two Davek umbrellas, a Solo and Traveller. Today, the third time my wife used the Traveller, it broke while opening. Disappointing.

Davek,Unfornately the review I'm giving Davek may not be to your expectations. The fact is i ordered your product on sunday the 18th expecting better shipping options then ground. I know weather permits in ground shipping, so with that said i have not received your product and will not get your product until the 28th of Dec., with no updates from UPS since the order except for "IN Transit".This was a gift for xmas but since ground shipping is all you offer to your customers, we are at the mercy of the shipping agancy and Davek..         I suggest in the near future Davek  offers customers much more options on shipping. Will I order the product again, in the near future sure i will.  I know your products/product are top notch and craftmanship that goes into the umbrellas are second to none. I feel at this moment and time i will not be ordering your product again or referring you on Social Media  until shipping options are improved.Happy New YearRegards,Keith

Review.Titre: Returning a piece I ordered was much …
Review.Contenu: Returning a piece I ordered was much more complicated than I felt it should have been, and they were not accomodating with an exchange.
The shaft is very flimsy and not strong enough for any wind. You’ll spend most of your time fighting this while getting wet.

This just doesn't make sense. So I bought the Davek Duet, a $150 umbrella. As best as I can tell, it's basically the same build quality as my $25 Totes umbrella (which also has a lifetime warranty, though was shredded in the recent derecho).The fabric is a little nicer, sure, and the handle is amazingly solid. BUT the wrist strap is too small to be easy to use, and because it's so thick and stuck in one spot on the handle, it makes it very uncomfortable to hold the umbrella with your left hand, assuming you want to be able to press the button with your thumb.The fabric is still only tacked on at the same amount of points as the Totes umbrella, nothing fancy. Also, it often doesn't completely open with just a button press - you have to give it a little shake or manually push the slider up the rest of the way. I contacted support when I found this, and even offered to try oiling the shaft, but they claimed this is "normal".This is a $25 umbrella with a $5 rock-solid good-looking uncomfortable-to-use handle - as best as I can tell, certainly not worth $150.
Stiff, difficult opening action was a huge disappointment to me. On the positive side, I did like its small size.
My trackable umbrella still doesn't work.  Contacted customer service but waiting to get replacement parts.

I ordered two different coloured Davek traveller umbrellas expecting to get exactly what I paid for and ordered. Nowhere were the colours I chose displayed as out of stock.I received an email from the Davek Team saying one of the colours I had ordered was out of stock. My return email requested that I did not want to receive two umbrellas of the same colour and not a black umbrella.The umbrellas are very experience $139 for each so one would expect to receive what was purchased.My order arrived and I received two fushia coloured umbrellas.No good enough Davek Accessories that is not what I purchased.Yes I could return one but that would cost me extra money.The reason why I gave Davek two stars is because the Davek Team displayed poor communication skills - I did not order two of thesame coloured umbrellas and the package department made a decision to disptach me two of the same coloured umbrellas. I feel as a customer Davek Accessories should have dispatched to me what I ordered or refunded $139 for one umbrella  because the company could not supply what I ordered.Davek Accessories needs to value their customer's patronage.
When it arrived, it would not stay open. I’ve returned it for a replacement. Have not received it yet.

Review.Titre: I do research for a living and thought…
Review.Contenu: I do research for a living and thought this umbrella was the one which would last a "lifetime".  Unfortunately, it's going back in the morning after about a years usage and $150 for ownership.  The "firing mechanism/button" failed and the leather fob which joins the strap to the umbrella is already flaking which is quite odd considering the price.  I hope they replace it and to be fair to the company - maybe I just got a "bad" one?  Time will tell...*UPDATE (3/10/19) The company replaced the above umbrella with a new one which to their credit - they did stand behind their warranty.  It would have been nice if someone would have at least responded to my concern regarding their products quality, however there was only an invoice and new umbrella in the box.  I also drive late model BMW's and when taken in for service they provide me nice loaner vehicles with a smile.  This weekend my loaner is a new 108K vehicle.  They smiled and said enjoy!  Now that's what I call customer service.  Companies need to understand it's also the words that go with the product which make our day many times, respect us and we will return the favor ten fold.

Review.Titre: Your ads followed me around the…
Review.Contenu: Your ads followed me around the Internet endlessly. Creepy. I tried to opt out but you would not relent
The Bluetooth umbrella keeps connecting and reconnecting Over and over. It's virtually useless

Review.Titre: Don’t know if it works on mini no
Review.Contenu: Don’t know if it works on mini. Could not figure out so just dumped in the draw.
Delivery took over a week, expected faster delivery. Products seems fine.

Review.Titre: Quality of mini umbrella was way less…
Review.Contenu: Quality of mini umbrella was way less than I expected.

Review.Titre: From The Very Best, To The Very Worst
Review.Contenu: My original Davek Umbrella I bought 3 years ago was strong, heavy duty, with leather wrap around.  Three years later I wanted to buy another one, the same because the original one I bought three years ago was worn out.  But it lasted a great three years.  I go to the same store where I purchased the first one, and I’m being told that particular one I purchased three years ago was discontinued.  Supposedly the next one I purchased was supposed to be similar to the one I purchased three years ago.  When I took the lid off of the box and took this umbrella out of the box, not only it did not have that leather wrap around, it was smaller,  and when I opened it, it was smaller, and the material looked cheap.  It was not heavy duty.  It was lightweight!!  Lightweight against the winds in NYC will not last beyond a few months, that about the time it would fall apart.  I did not keep this, I took it back to the store.  The management said this was the best they could do.  I asked for a refund.  The following week I called the Davek Corporate Office, on Madison Avenue.  After explaining my plight to one of the executives, he said he would look to see if it could be find the exact kind I purchased three years ago by calling the warehouse.  A couple of days later I received another Umbrella.  I opened the box, it was not the heavy duty one, but it did have the leather wrap around.   Instead, it was the same lightweight cheap one I bought at the store.  The only thing different was it had the leather wrap around.  It was smaller then the original and lightweight.This was no good.  I called the corporate office again, and spoke with the same executive.  He said that there was nothing more they could do.  Except get a refund by send them back the other one.  I sent it back.   Not happy about this.  Davek was supposed to be about Quality!  The original one I bought three years ago was $149.00, but it was worth it!  Now, I spend $149.00, and get a smaller, lightweight piece of garbage.

Review.Titre: Not made for the cross-winds of London.
The sewing on the strap became loose …[UPDATED]
Review.Contenu: The sewing on the strap became loose after two uses. Reached out to the company upon registering the product, but no response. I don't think it is fair that I would have to pay shipping and handling for a repairing/replacing a faulty product.*UPDATE*Firstly, I would like to revise the rating from a 1-Star to 2-Star, since 1-Star was defined as "1 star: Bad – unacceptable experience, unreasonable and rude conduct.". None of the representatives were rude in any way, so I thought this revision would be fair.Secondly, to clarify, this is on the Solo Umbrella. While my review is negative, I do love the look and feel of the umbrella except for the defective strap. I've also bought the Mini, which is holding up great so far.Thirdly, upon the post of my first review, I did receive an e-mail from their support team:"Sorry we missed your original email. If your umbrella needs repair, you can send it back to us as per the warranty. We will either fix it or  more likely send a brand new umbrella back to you. Please send the umbrella back to us for repair/replacement...Include your name, mailing address and receipt for return shipping payment  with your return. "While I understand that it is fair for customers to pay for shipping both ways (to Davek and back to you) if it is a repair due to regular wear-and-tear or customer-driven factors. However, it does not seem fair to the customers who received a defective product, who will have to pay shipping to davek PLUS an additional $9.95 for return shipping (essentially a 20 dollar penalty). This was my original issue, and that being responded by a standard template response that does not even address the issue, was a major disappointment for me. Since I don't want the strap to ruin the integrity of the entire umbrella, I will be returning this for a replacement. Hopefully that one will hold up.Their lifetime guarantee does offer some great benefits for long-term users, but can really short-change those who receive a defective product.Fellow customers, please be aware you are taking that risk with this umbrella.

Review.Titre: THE DAVEK MINI and return policy
Review.Contenu: Ordered both the THE DAVEK MINI and THE DAVEK SOLO. Arrived in a reasonable amount of time. THE DAVEK SOLO is an attractive umbrella, that is fairly well made, but not worth the price.THE DAVEK MINI is attractive but in function and quality build falls short and is not much better than a $15 umbrella you can purchase from a street vendor. I was going to return, but you have to pay for shipping back and they also deduct $10 for the original shipping to you. So it will cost you more than $20 to return a $59 umbrella. BTW you can also purchase these umbrella's from AMAZON.

Review.Titre: The signature umbrellas quality is meh
Review.Contenu: The signature umbrellas quality is fine. Definitely not what I’d expect from a $150 item. The metal finishes feel like plastic covered with metallic paint, the shafts fiberglass pattern makes it look like it is chipped, the metal part on the handle doesn’t look like it was completely put on before gluing, and the leather feels fake. I will say the release mechanism is very good, quick to open, and feels sturdy. I wouldn’t buy again though, I feel like this is the company’s high margin product. It would be extremely difficult to tell this apart from an Amazon equivalent.

Review.Titre: The umbrella for two that arrived works…
Review.Contenu: The umbrella for two that arrived works fine and is beautiful, the mini umbrella does not open at all rendering it useless. A solo bought a few years back malfunctioned in the fall of 2022🥲!

Review.Titre: The umbrella is  nice but when I tried…
Review.Contenu: The umbrella is  nice but when I tried to exchange it, it would cost $22 in shipping.  For the price of these umbrellas it should be free shipping on returns or exchanges.
Only had it less than a week, Nothing spectacular, just a small umbrella. Haven't had a chance to try in rain yet.
I love the big umbrella, but the mini umbrella was a waste of money, I’ll probably trash it

Review.Titre: It would have been better if you…
Review.Contenu: It would have been better if you honored your coupon for the purchase.
It seems flimsy. It doesn’t go up automatically and it seems small

The umbrellas are great.  Not so with their zippered wallets.  Difficult to fit credit cards and difficult to remove.  I've bought Bellroy products to compare and the leathers are softer and more manageable.  Time will tell how durable these are in comparison.  In the meanwhile I'm not completely thrilled with this product but will live with it for now.  Umbrellas, "YES", wallets, "NO".

Being seventy-nine years old and having several umbrellas in my life, I thought I would get a small umbrella that would last. I must say that I've never bought an umbrella that cost more than ten dollars. Spending fifty dollars seemed that it should certainly be good. I was disappointed when I received it. Yes, the size was great. Its construction seems good. I do have a problem getting it opened with my arthritis.

We bought a Davek Traveler which we used minimally for a year then one of the spokes broke and we applied for it to be replaced.  Surprised to have to pay 40% of reg. price.  Thought it should have been replaced free. New umbrella arrived rapidly, seems to work fine, have not used it in rain.

Review.Titre: The umbrella is OK, but not great
Review.Contenu: The umbrella is nice, but the cover/sleeve for it when it is closed is too tight, and when the umbrella is open/extended an unnecessary flap of material hangs off one of the spokes.It’s an OK umbrella, but I wouldn’t call it great.

Review.Titre: Beautiful but hasn’t rained since they arrived
Review.Contenu: This is for the loss alert sensor for the umbrella I put it on the umbrella and have been taking my umbrella back and forth to work but have not got to use it yet because it hasn’t rained since I got it so I was showing my daughter my new umbrella a the little sensor is already lost off the umbrella what a waste 😅it is called for rain tomorrow so maybe I’ll get to try out both my new umbrellas then I will update on them

Review.Titre: Although I haven't used it yet
Review.Contenu: Although I haven't used it yet, when i opened the umbrella the handle seems pretty loose and not as sturdy as I was expecting.  I ordered the mini for an upcoming trip overseas and the size seems perfect for my small bag.  I ordered red and the color is fabulous. I'm just not sold on the handle and how it will hold up in the weather. I thought about returning it but then saw they don't pay for returns. And if I do return it, I have to pay for the original shipping amount, which they deduct from the amount reimbursed.  I decided to keep it as the size and color are perfect. I'm just praying it does its job and is able to weather any storms.

The Royal Blue" was not.   The color I received was Light/Medium Light---very disappointing...Royal is a masculine color, light blue is not.....I liked the umbrella enough to give it as a gift, and ordered another one.....if this one is not the "correct" color, I will send it back for a refund.   As a business, you have to get these things straight.

Review.Titre: I think the umbrella is fine
Review.Contenu: I think the umbrella is fine. It seems very sturdy and is easy to pop up and down. However, I had to hunt through the neighborhood to find it because it was delivered to the neighbor in back of me. It took me a while to track it down, and it took a while to have an online chat with a representative from UPS. If the carrier had sent me a picture, it would have been helpful. I would have known where to start.

Review.Titre: When the umbrella came in it looked…decent
Review.Contenu: When the umbrella came in it looked good! However, after only a day of very light use, (no rainiest carrying it with me) the end cap came off! I called in and spoke with a representative about it and she said she'd send another one out to me. If I pay a chunk of change for an umbrella I expect it to give me years of trust worthy service and not disassemble at the very sight of me! lol

Review.Titre: Not as sturdy as we’d hoped
Review.Contenu: The umbrella comes in impressive packaging, looks great and opens and closes powerfully. But when open, it doesn’t feel as strong as we thought it would. We bought it to replace a wind-proof umbrella we got from Hammacher Schlemmer years ago and recently lost. The old umbrella was much sturdier. We’ll see how this performs in strong wind.

Review.Titre: Nice umbrella, but lacks open and close button.
Review.Contenu: I guess I didn’t do my homework, because I bought my wife the $100 umbrella, which is beautiful, very strong and has a button that both opens and closes the umbrella. I decided to get the smallest model, which I thought was super convenient at 7 inches. I assumed that the little one was as sturdy as the other and also had the button. I was mistaken on both counts. I’ll keep the umbrella because it’s a pain to return things, but I’m disappointed.

I bought the Davek Mini and Traveler combo. I like the Mini. It lives up to the name and works well for a small, manual umbrella. I'm not wild about the Traveler. It has an overly small handle for the weight of the umbrella and is tough to hold. The strap is awkward. I cannot fit my hand through it, it is stiff leather, it doesn't fall to a hang but instead sticks out, and it is more nuisance than functional.

The mini umbrella is quite nice and it is the right size for my purse which is what I was looking for in a good umbrella, however it is manual and that is exactly what I was not looking for in a good umbrella. I'm sure that this is my fault and that I somehow missed this in your description but with all that I need to carry while on my way into work, this is not at all what I wanted or needed. I absolutely need a small umbrella with automatic opening, so I will have to return the Davek  mini.

Review.Titre: I purchased the smallest size travel…
Review.Contenu: I purchased the smallest size travel umbrella. The size is good for packing as it is small and light. However, it is difficult to get opened. It takes some muscle to get the ribs to lock into the shaft.  It is a struggle in the rain and if one has anything else in hand (purse, packages, etc.), it is impossible to manoever.  Prepare to get wet!

So far, the umbrella is average and there are actually lighter umbrellas out in the market that have just as good or better quality than these Davek Umbrellas.  Also, shipping to Hawaii is expensive, but I took the chance on this umbrella anyways.  It does the job, but because there are others (from Japan where my wife frequents a lot), I have to give it the average rating.  Although it is lighter than most mini umbrellas, there are still lighter and better ones out there.

Review.Titre: Received the umbrella right away and…
Review.Contenu: Received the umbrella right away and packaged well. A nice and compact umbrella. But there was a scratch on the end cap of the handle that is quite noticeable since it’s a shiny cap. Wrote to customer support and awaiting for a response for a replacement.

Review.Titre: It's an okay compact umbrella but overpriced.
Review.Contenu: It's an okay compact umbrella, but the quality does not justify the high price. For instance, the frame geometry is complex, and there are small, hand-tied strings that tether the fabric and the frame. These tethers help coax the fabric into conforming to the shape as the frame folds. On my product, one of these string ties has come completely undone, and another is untied and about to come unraveled. It will still function, but it doesn't fold neatly without manually tucking the fabric into place.

Davek Traveler.I ordered this umbrella from Davek. It is what it is. I was surprised by its girth (hard to pack), lack of coverage for its length, and the aggressiveness of the mechanism. I returned it. I hope to replace it with a Knirps T100. Even counting the $20 I lost on on shipping both ways, I will save money and getting more coverage with the Knirps. Based on the ads and reviews, I expected more for a luxury priced umbrella.  Nothing wrong with it. Nothing special either.

Review.Titre: Can’t recommend these umbrellas for long term use
Review.Contenu: The return/exchange process for defective umbrellas is expensive. It costs $20 to do an exchange because they make you pay for shipping both ways. Then the new umbrella they send you is of lower quality than the one you sent in for repair. My original umbrella had a leather strap. This new one has a nylon strap. I wouldn’t buy from Davek again and customer service hasn’t been helpful at all. They want another $10 to send me the version with the leather strap. It’s laughable.

Review.Titre: While I love the Davek umbrellas
Review.Contenu: While I love the Davek umbrellas, I was disappointed to discover that I could not order the umbrella I wanted from the company's Canadian site. I had to order it from the US site and have it shipped to a friend in the United States.Davek: it's an international market out there. Don't pare down your catalog for international customers.Thanks for making great products - but give us access to all of them.

So far the mini umbrella is doing well. It’s very light, opens easily, and seems to do well with light wind. I haven’t had occasion to use it in a heavier wind.
