I’m disappointed that the yellow is actually orange, and not at all close to the yellow on the website. If I could change that, I would. Otherwise, I like it a lot.

Review.Titre: Davek Solo- Nice, but not $100 worth of nice
Review.Contenu: I just received my Davek Solo umbrella, and honestly my several years old $20 Totes umbrella opens more smoothly, and completely- the Solo doesn't quite open completely, it stops about an inch shy of being fully open, have to "manually" push it up. I'm sure it is otherwise more strongly constructed, but certainly doesn't seem to be worth $100.

The information about the Traveler umbrella was misleading. The umbrella is much heavier & bigger than I expected. Product information did not give weight & size. It was not easy to find returns information on the website & not possible to get a return label forcing me to go to a Post Office which was not convienent.

Review.Titre: Surprised by very small diameter when open.
Review.Contenu: I was surprised by how small all three of the umbrellas are.  By this I'm referring to the diameter when they are open.  So I am not certain how useful they will be to me.  In retrospect, I should have paid more attention to the size information before I placed the order.  The other important test - how well they hold up over time - I will not be able to assess until I have had and used them for some time.  I hope they prove worth the cost.

Review.Titre: For the price, packaging and product was a let down
Review.Contenu: Ordered the set with the mini-umbrella as a gift  The large umbrella was in a box but the mini umbrella was wrapped separately  in bubble wrap. The items were not secured. There is a sturdiness to the product but once closed you have to stuff the umbrella material into the pouch. I and my recipient felt deprived of a pleasant shopping experience. I am not sure I would order a Davek product for myself.

Received the 3 umbrellas I ordered. The mini @ $49 is where I am most sceptical. It is small and light. Stiff and difficult to open it. Does not appear or feel like "more". So I will need time and experience to "sell" me either way. The Solo and Traveler are as I expected. Sizes are perfect. Not as easy to put up as others I've owned but I'm sure that will become my standard soon enough.

Review.Titre: One strut already bent after 3 days
Review.Contenu: I've had my Davek Solo for 3 days and already one strut is bent. It still works but is a little slower to open/close and one side of the umbrella is not fully rounded. I haven't been mistreating it. Hopefully it will hold up and not get worse, otherwise I'm going to have to take advantage of that warranty very soon. I really hoped this Davek would be stronger than my previous umbrella which was one-twentieth the price...

Review.Titre: Umbrella arrived in destroyed box. Shipping cost too high for this service.
Review.Contenu: I just received the above order via UPS and wanted to share with you some photos of the mangled box in which it arrived.Fortunately, the umbrella appears to be in OK shape though the accompanying brochures and Packing slip were also a bit crunched. I attempted to send some photos to your support email, but they were rejected.Shipping costs of $9.95 seem somewhat high when a package arrives in this condition.

I bought this item as a gift. I’m confident the umbrella would be superb and work as advertisedBUT the GIFT WRAP was very poorly done. Crooked folds, crinkled paper, and unsightly placement of tape. Simple doesn’t match the premium feel the brand portrays.

Bought the Traveller umbrella and am quite satisfied with the product, but not the color. The fuschia is not as it appeared to me on the website. I was told that to exchange it for another color, I would have to pay postage to return it plus postage to receive the new one. At $20 postage (plus initial postage), it's not worth it. Most other companies have free postage on exchanges.

Review.Titre: No Free Shipping for a $99 Umbrella
Review.Contenu: I don't get it, really. They offer free shipping on orders of $100 or more, and they price their signature umbrella at $99. It is just insulting to the customer. I don't know who runs their marketing, but he/she does not understand customers. It IS an outstanding umbrella. I just don't care for their little trickery about "free" shipping.

Review.Titre: My husband bought a Davek umbrella for…
Review.Contenu: My husband bought a Davek umbrella for me on Gilt.  It broke almost immediately.  The loss protection code only allowed for a discounted purchase of a replacement, not a full replacement, as it was required to register it since it was rom a 3rd party.  So, I ordered a new one thinking  was now protected....NOPE...new one was discounted, so no warranty....I probably would not have spent the money if I knew there was not warranty...especially after the first one broke with very normal use.

Review.Titre: Good Product, But Has A Few Flaws For The Price
Review.Contenu: The umbrella is beautiful and well made, with the exception of where it hooks back into the fiberglass when you bring it down. It seams like it should probably have a ring around the hole, or something to make the appearance cleaner, as it does not look neat as you would expect. Also, when bringing it down, it moves a bit, making it difficult to secure in a fast situation. Great Product, I guess it's the little things when you spend that much on an umbrella!

1. Compact/Portable2. Good Coverage3. Very water resistant/wind resistant 4. Excellent Craftsmanship5. Exceptional Overall UmbrellaUnfortunately...after one use of this umbrella, one of the springs and the binding came undone during a 10 minute walk. I'm not sure how this happened from one use but I may have received a somewhat faulty umbrella. Not to worry, this umbrella is exceptional otherwise, plus Davek has a lifetime warranty on all of their umbrellas (I think) So I'm sure it will be no problem to exchange for a new one.

The umbrella itself is good quality.  It is SO heavy!  The handle where the mechanism is is disproportionately heavy.  Hanging it from my belt loop pulls my pants down. The button is very hard to push. Wish I had sent it back, but Hurricane Irma was hitting my area and I had to evacuate as well as I needed an umbrella.

Review.Titre: black friday weekend 20% off a bit too late
Review.Contenu: The umbrella was to arrive on 11/30 after the Thanksgiving weekend, yet Davek did not menton the black friday sale until after the product was ordered.  I am sure the sale was anticipated and the retail stores of old would have told you of an upcoming promotion but everyone is on-line now and there is no need for that, I guess

Review.Titre: it would be best if your tracking info…
Review.Contenu: it would be best if your tracking info for expedited orders came from Davek.You send via UPS which I get, however I do not know which shipper you use and was not aware to look for that info regarding my order, from someone else.I paid extra for shipping service but did not feel like extra service was provided.

Purchased the Solo model.  Beautifully packaged and arrived quickly.  I was intrigued with the auto-open/close feature and the quality construction.  I was surprised at how heavy the umbrella was, especially considering the compact size.  There is also an odd "clip" on the handle which makes holding the umbrella a bit awkward.  Not sure what the clip is meant for.  The color combo (black/wasabi) is beautiful and I wish it was offered on other models. But due to the negative attributes (for my use), it was returned.

Review.Titre: The Davek Mini did not open …
Review.Contenu: The Davek Mini did not open automatically.  Reviewed product online at davekny.com. and umbrella did not specify manual operation.  Umbrella was difficult to keep in the open position.  Too much force was necessary to lock open.  It was difficult for my spouse too close.  Will be returning the product to Davek

Purchased the mini. Not impressed. Hard to lock in place and the material is not what you expected. Cheap vinyl materials was used like the other inexpensive mini umbrellas you’ll find on amazon.  The high quality on it was the handle itself only. So i am giving it a 3 star.

Ordered this fine umbrella, still hoping at some point it may find its way . thanks for asking, may I suggest that if you offer free shipping to entice then strap the thing to a snails backside that asking for a review of the product can only be a review of my experience to date.  Haventbseen the thing yet, but hopeful.

Review.Titre: Was expecting I guess really impressive…
Review.Contenu: Was expecting I guess really impressive and solidly built umbrellas by Davek but these appear to be just a notch above a nice $40 umbrella and not worth the $120 expense.  Duet doesn’t open all the way with the button push—quite disappointed.

I recently purchased the 1x THE DAVEK TRAVELER umbrella.  The opening mechanism works great but in closing the umbrella (it retracts easily enough) but getting it back to be fully collapsed is difficult.  I was trying this outside in dry weather - I would hate to do this with a wet umbrella as I will get soaked.

Bought the classic and the traveler as gifts.  Quick and easy but would have been nice if I could create my own combination order as I would have opted for the XL and the traveler.  It saved a little money. The quality and presentation were good but the coverage is pretty poor on both of these models IMHO.

The Davek Duo is a well made high quality umbrella. Most of the concerns of traditional umbrellas have been resolved. Still needing refinement  are below:It is a heavy productThe round handle is difficult to hold when windy.The wrist loop does not open enough to put your hand through.

The umbrella is amazing. The tracker failed to work even with trying two brand new batteries. The build quality of the tracker seems poor - the exact opposite of the umbrella quality which is great. Best to get a Tile tracker instead.

I received my Davek Solo.The supports are a bit non-uniform.The closing latch is cumbersome.The construction seems imprecise.  I might return it.I feel like I paid $65 for marketing, and $35 for the actual umbrella.Nice packaging, good quality marketing-Questionable quality.

Review.Titre: The umbrella is heavier then I would…
Review.Contenu: The umbrella is heavier then I would like. Hard to carry. It is taller then I can use.If I could I would have returned it. But it seems your company is not consumer friendly. I am sorry I bought it. I would not recommend it to anyone. SorryPaul Portugal

Review.Titre: I bought a duet and solo and the …
Review.Contenu: I bought a duet and solo and the handles wiggle like a cheap umbrella. Also the plastic cap on the solo popped off and I had to glue it back on. And the duet does not opens all the way automatically. Otherwise they seem to be good umbrellas and perform very well.

This review is for the mini umbrella. Be sure to check the specifications which indicate that it is a manual open close mechanism. The mechanism feels very cheap, and I have had other small umbrellas which open and close with ease in a superior fashion. The canopy size is also insufficient for good coverage. Now the umbrella needs to be returned, and the company will not be reimbursing for the shipping. I was considering replacing it with a travel umbrella, which is slightly larger and has the automatic open close mechanism, but the Exchange policy does not include reimbursement for shipping.

Thought the umbrella would be great, however after only two uses a spoke is bent. Still waiting for response to my email re refund or replacement. Expensive umbrella and even my cheap umbrellas have lasted years longer than that. Disappointed ☹️

Bought a combined umbrellas of Davek Solo and Duet.  Strangely the Solo’s trigger mechanisms is not as responsive as Duet.  You need to press harder for it to open or close the umbrella.  Kind of disappointing when you paid so much for an umbrella.

Small umbrella (Travelers) works well. Large one (Solo) very difficult to open or close, requires two thumbs and a hammer grip.  Both look very nice and I presume shed rain well (used only the small one so far, for the reason mentioned).

The umbrella is acceptable, but the carrying strap is not large enough to fit over a hand onto a wrist, so it has to be carried in your fingers or in some sort of bag when not in use. To me this is an unnecessary drawback in such an expensive umbrella.

It's OK. I bought if for my wife and she was not that impressed. It's stylish for sure, but closing it is somewhat difficult and it's not that much different than ones that are much cheaper. I like it but I would not order it again.

I purchased the umbrella for it's design and strength and that is working out for me.  I upgraded to umbrella with a locator since I am forever leaving my umbrella under a desk or lunch table.  This has not worked since I purchased the item.

The umbrella is great, the ordering process is smooth, but the order tracking and shipping tracking information is not available anywhere on the web site. I had to write an email to find out where my order was. That made me anxious.

I purchased the solo and traveler in a combo deal.  The solo for myself and the traveler for my wife.  The main reason I purchased the traveler was to give my wife a good quality, light Umbrella she could carry in her tote bag.  Unfortunately, the umbrella was heavier than expected and the handle was a bit too uncomfortable.  The Solo was also a bit too heavy and uncomfortable.  The Solo opened automatically but would not close as described.  I needed  to return it for an exchange and the company would not pay for the return postage.  I returned them on my dime but felt that the company should at the lease pay for return postage when the umbrella does not function as described.

Product arrived promptly, but did not operate properly.  The umbrella opened, but one of the nine "arms" would not close.  I would have thought that (for $100 umbrella) quality control would be better - testing merchandise before fulfillment.After I called for a return/replacement - I was assured that I would receive the new umbrella Monday (it arrived Tuesday).  No discount or offering for my troubles to make a trip to a UPS store to manage the return process.  Would I recommend to a friend - unsure.  Am I satisfied -  (somewhat), but time will tell (as my concern now lies with the operational quality over time vs. price I paid).

Review.Titre: you billed me three times for the same…
Review.Contenu: you billed me three times for the same transaction, and now I have to go through the hassle of getting things straightened out.I wouldn't order online from you again--there's something terribly wrong with your system.

Review.Titre: The shipping is in need of attention
Review.Contenu: Update 8/1/2018: I bought a second Davek dual umbrella and recently tested it in the DMV area with these continuous down pours and was very disappointed that it barely covered me compared to my much cheaper work umbrella. On the good side of the story, it held up during the slight winds on that day.The shipping is in need of attention. The package was delivered with evidence that someone cut through and examined its content. Thankful that the content was gift wrapped. Disappointed that Davek didn't offer engraving. Product seemed sturdy and of high quality.  Can't wait to gift it to my new son n law at their wedding this weekend. It will be tested around the world.

I was anticipating a really top notch umbrella but what I received was fine. The handle is a but hard to hold due to an ill placed holder. Overall, though, the fabrication and material seems quite good, so I'm optimistic.

Bought the Solo. Pretty well made, but not worth the price. My original lasted about a year and a half only, with normal use, mostly sitting in my work brief. The leather strap broke about 6 months in, one arm would not retract without manually moving it, then finally an arm split in half when opening, out of nowhere. So I sent back.Lifetime guarantee is pretty good. Any issues, send it back, in about a week, they send it a new one (they charge shipping, for both ways, ~$20 total). Be sure to register your umbrella ASAP. If not, and you throw away original box/tags, they will be stingy with loss protection guarantee, even if you have original purchase receipts.

Review.Titre: Google Pixel does not work well with the Davek Alert
Review.Contenu: Spoke to Davek and performed a few tests. It seems the umbrella connects and operates well on an iPhone but not my Google Pixel. I will also reach out to Google to see if there are some issues on the Bluetooth side.Thanks

Review.Titre: My Davek Solo started coming apart…
Review.Contenu: My Davek Solo started coming apart after six months of normal use. I am still waiting to hear back from Davek after I sent it in for repairs. The umbrella is overpriced and I do not recommend it.

Very well made umbrella but a tad small for the price.  I’m a small person and still get more wet than acceptable. I’ve owned $20 umbrellas with a slightly larger radius thus giving more coverage from the rain.

Umbrella seems well made, but I found this model to be too small. To cover a grown man completely the umbrella must be carried close to ones face and centered on the nose. I should have purchased a larger one.

My expectations were super high for these expensive a$$ umbrellas. I bought a combo package that included the solo and elite. The three stars are only because the customer service is great, other than that these things are just plainly over priced. I do plan on sending these made in China overpriced umbrellas back to New York. It's an umbrella. The wording used to describe these things are simply fillers, don't be fooled. I was truly expecting better craftsmanship. The pommel and the button to open the umbrella are cheaply crafted...surely a couple of more dollars could yield better material. Slapping your name on something and self promoting yourself as the best...this should be disputed. Really.

Review.Titre: Extending great, retraction not so much
Review.Contenu: It works very well when extending but retraction requires a lot of pressure to close the handle. The button is too hard for my wife to push. She's a bit disappointed as it was a gift to her.

Review.Titre: So much heavier than my old mini…
Review.Contenu: So much heavier than my old mini umbrella (not a Davek), but I suppose because it's built to last!Very impressed by your lifetime warranty, including %0% offer on a replacement even you lose it!

Review.Titre: The advertisement on Facebook was that…
Review.Contenu: The advertisement on Facebook was that the price was $89.00 for the  cost of one small Davek umbrella and there was a 15% discount for each order. I ordered 2 umbrellas because of the advertised 15% discount & the free shipping. There was a free shipping but there was NO 15% discount!!!!. I was disappointed!!.The total charge was still $89.00 each x 2 = $178.00 with no 15% discount. A very FALSE Advertisement. I advise everyone not to believed on any Facebook ad anymore. I don’t & I won’t anymore!!!!!!!!!!!With 15% discount the price for each umbrella, could have been only $75.65 each x 2 = $151.30. I should have been charged for $151.30 with 15% discount but NO, Davek still charged me with the full amount!!!!. It sucks!!!
I saw multiple creases and wrinkles at folds and expected a neat single predefined crease, especially at this price -this review won't let me attach a photo. The mechanism appeared sturdy though.

The umbrella is made well but I don’t think it is worth the price. I think windbrella is a better umbrella at half the cost the the Davek. I wouldn’t buy another or recommend that anyone else buy one.

Review.Titre: I returned the Alert. I'm sure it's a very nice umbrella but I never opened it.
Review.Contenu: I was disappointed. I ordered and received the Davek Alert. The concept behind the Alert is that you won't lose/forget your umbrella due to your use of the Davek App. What they neglect to say (until you dig through the Q & A on your app store. This should be but is not mentioned on davekny.com) is that YOU HAVE TO ACTIVATE THE APP EACH DAY THAT YOU INTEND TO USE the umbrella. Honestly, if I could remember to re-activate an app every time I needed its functionality I would probably not be forgetting my $125 umbrella to begin with.I was also disappointed that in returning the umbrella I have to reimburse Davek's 'free shipping' which means it's not really free. (That, at least, IS mentioned on their site.)

Review.Titre: Umbrellas are great; website needs work
Review.Contenu: The print point for free shipping is just above the price of two mini umbrellas. And while I would have been happy to purchase one locally, the locations for the Chicago area weren't correct.

Review.Titre: Expect it to be better for the price
Review.Contenu: I got the Davek Mini in yellow color. It’s not as strong as I expected, difficult to open and you can see some loos threads which need to be cut off. Minor scratches on the shaft as well.

Review.Titre: I ordered a mini umbrella and travel…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a mini umbrella and travel umbrella.The travel one stoped working after just several openings.I did not save the box or paperwork for return.

Review.Titre: good but needs a couple of little tweaks.....davek-mini
Review.Contenu: Hi I got the miniWhen you shake it, it's dry, that is brilliant. It survived a relatively windy wet day very well, blew out a couple of times went back into shape well.kept me dry...now the bad points....Davek please take note.The closing wrap around fastening strap needs some extra protection where it's stitched to the umbrella, a little square patch either side will prevent this, can already see a little hole here...this will rip with time. Disappointing.Also when it blew out the stitching broke on a couple of the supports so again may make that a little more robust too. The handle could do with being about 6" longerNo automatic function on this model.... and no belt clip.I do like it.... but it could be so much better!I'm an engineer so I'm fussy and if there's a flaw I'll find it!

Review.Titre: The wifi enabled umbrella arrived and…
Review.Contenu: The wifi enabled umbrella arrived and is fine, except it is way too small. It came with no return label. I had to request instructions for returns from the company.

Review.Titre: The opening mechanism is difficult - The Davek Mini
Review.Contenu: The opening mechanism is difficult.  It does not open easily and it does not fold up nicely.  For the hefty price tag, I am a little disappointed.  Considering returning it.

Review.Titre: Heavy, durable, but not user friendly.
Review.Contenu: I bought two umbrellas, the mini, and the traveler. The mini is a decent buy. I travel a lot and it fits in my backpack or a messenger bag. However, I am unsure whether it has fully opened since it clicks indicating it is locked and ready to use, but at times, it doesn’t. I don’t see anything in the reviews about it.The traveler is aesthetically nice. It looks like an expensive umbrella, which it is. That is where my positive ends. I was planning to give it to my mother since it gave me the impression that it would be easy for her to use with just the push of a button. It isn’t. First of all, it’s quite heavy. Secondly, the wrist strap gets in the way. Thirdly, I find it extremely (yes extremely) difficult to pull it back to lock it. I am a guy in my 40s and my mother is in her 70s. This won’t be a good buy if you have some hand or wrist issues.
I love Davek umbrellas, but I've had three of them break on me within a year of use and have had to have them replaced by Davek - which is also what make them so great.
Brought one umbrella that easily broke. I ended up buying another through their lost/damage 50% off program... and they don't offer free shipping for $100+ umbrella...
Great umbrellas,  But I ordered black and brown for our trip to Europe.  I received pink and brown.  Too late to send back before the trip.  Guess I am using the pink.

Review.Titre: The umbrella looks and feels great, but doesn't open all the way.
Review.Contenu: The umbrella looks and feels great, but doesn't open completely by itself. I have to shake it to get it to pop all the up. For $150, it shouldn't happen.
This product isn’t very effective. Email alerts are not helpful when needing to know that my umbrella was left behind. A sound alert is more efficient.

I ordered the Davek Solo and was excited to begin using my new luxury umbrella. Everything looked great when I unpacked it. The umbrella felt study and substantial. All of the materials were top quality. Unfortunately when I hit the release/open button the umbrella only deployed about 90% of the way. The umbrella did not open into a locked position, I had to manually open the umbrella the rest of the way. I was disappointed that such a well-regarded item didn’t work right out of the box.I contacted customer service and explained the problem to them. They apologized and offered to send out a new umbrella immediately. They also offered to send a shipping label to return the defective one. I have not received the replacement umbrella yet. I am hopeful that my first umbrella was an anomaly and the replacement will provide many years of service.
I just received the mini umbrella and haven’t had a chance to try it out. The quality looks good. It was a bit stiff to open. I’m hoping that’s because it’s new?..
We were very happy with the umbrella's look and function; but, we thought it was overpriced for its size. We kinda wished we'd bought a larger diameter model.

Review.Titre: I like the size of the umbrella (the …
Review.Contenu: I like the size of the umbrella (the mini) but I was disappointed because the mechanism is not as smooth and easy as expected from an umbrella of this price !!!!
Seems overrated. Well built and sturdy but doesn’t justify the price. In this  price class, it should at least have a double canopy for wind resistance.

expecting umbrella to be slightly larger for the model ordered .  Airtag did not work initially when umbrella was in closed position.  working on retry . Slightly heavy, but the tradeoff if it indeed works on high winds, then it is worth it..

Review.Titre: Received umbrellas in a timely manner
Review.Contenu: Received umbrellas in a timely manner. They are light weight as desired. Disappointed they don’t open with a push button.

My original umbrella actually broke, which was a bit disappointing. I did have a replacement number and was able to purchase another umbrella for 50% off - still a good deal of money. I'm hoping that it will actually demonstrate the quality that is part of the brand.

Review.Titre: I ordered three umbrellas in three…
Review.Contenu: I ordered three umbrellas in three sizes; the tiny one for traveling; the mini for my attaché case and the regular size (to be determined as to where to use it). The construction is fine and the button to open and collapse is nice. My only complaint, and it's a small one, is that they weigh more than I would like because the material is thicker than any other umbrella I've owned. You have to carefully fold the pleats to make it collapse down to where it fits in its sheath.

I would have given this umbrella 5 stars if not for the fact it is difficult for me to do the final closing. I have arthritis in my hands and it is hard to muster the strength required to close it completely. I am hoping with use the umbrella will be easier to close.

Review.Titre: I love the size of your mini umbrella
Review.Contenu: I love the size of your mini umbrella.  It fits in my purse perfectly.  I ordered 2 more for my friends - I wish you would provide a gift box for your mini umbrellas (as you do for the others) It's makes for a better presentation for a gift.

Review.Titre: Love the umbrella but there’s an…
Review.Contenu: Love the umbrella but there’s an obvious flaw on the cane handle.  I don’t mind when a natural flaw looks natural.  But this one looks like a genuine chip in the wood.  Someone should have caught this. It’s such a great hand-assembled and high-end product.  Do details matter.
Wonderful umbrellas; the Bluetooth accessory is not necessary. Would opt out of that. I have one of each of the umbrellas. Great balance, sturdy and compact.

Haven’t had a chance to use it yet. But the color is great. It arrived promptly, within a few days. The mechanism is smooth,  and the umbrella appears to be sturdy and well-made. Plus, packaging was both effective and upscale. Now it just has to rain!

Review.Titre: The umbrella is exactly as shown
Review.Contenu: The umbrella is exactly as shown, very small when folded, and perfect for traveling. I can even fit it inside my purse. A little pricey for an umbrella but I like it. Delivered quickly as well.

Review.Titre: well i had 3 umbrellas sent to my home
Review.Contenu: well i had 3 umbrellas sent to my home. all had the same problem. none of them opened all the way up folks on the phone were helpful  and always sent me a replacement. all had the same problem. i did keep the 3rd one sent to me even though it too had the same problem. i do wish i could get something for the time spent

Review.Titre: So helpful to offer a discount on a…
Review.Contenu: So helpful to offer a discount on a replacement for a lost umbrella! Really appreciate that!

Review.Titre: There was one item from the three…
Review.Contenu: There was one item from the three original orders  that was not in the package of shipment.
Quality everything would recommend, scuffs and scrapes on handle of 1 boxed umbrella.

Review.Titre: I think it's great in size & color
Review.Contenu: I think it's great in size & color. I bought for my son to use when he travel on bus it fits great in his backpack when he'll need it.

I have not had a chance to use the umbrella as it's January in Chicagoland do umbrellas are not a big issue now. I must admit the umbrella appears to be very well made and appealing to the eye. I like the open and closing mechanism I can see where the locator would come in handy as some would not have a second thought about picking this handsome piece up. Rather expensive so I hope it holds up to the Chicago wind.

For a small umbrella, the coverage is ample for door to door dashing through the rain. The closing of the umbrella is a little tight; a push button for it would have been a better device. Overall I’d give it a thumbs up. I had it in the back pocket of my khaki pants and didn’t even know it was there. Living in Florida an umbrella is a necessity.

I received an order confirmation, but not a shipping notification, so my purchase was almost stolen because I did not know when my purchase was going to be delivered.Other than that, the entire experience was great. It was easy for me to find the product I was looking for, with the customization I wanted. Of course the product itself is of excellent quality. It is durably constructed and stylish. A great combination for a necessity like an umbrella.

The quality of your umbrellas is outstanding. Color options good and shipping was efficient. Only comment is the price- a bit high but the phrase "you get what you pay for" fits. I'd like to see more bundling options for next year's Christmas presents. I have now purchased 4, having left 2 somewhere (obviously someone else also realized the quality because they were not returned).

Review.Titre: I have not opened the box to see what…
Review.Contenu: I have not opened the box to see what the umbrella looks or feels like because it is a Christmas gift but I assume it will be fine. I received the product in good time so that is good, but the "Gift box" I paid an extra $5 for was extremely disappointing! It was flimsy and ugly and probably only cost .75 cents to make and a $1 at most to purchase. Do not offer that option in the future - or charge us more for a higher quality gift box. Thanks.

I am happy overall. The umbrella is not wind-proof, as it was blown inside out once when I first used it. The good news is that it didn’t break, and I was able to pop it right back into shape. The tracking feature is nice. A transmitter in the handle sends an alarm to my phone app when my phone gets out of a certain range of the umbrella: this keeps me from losing it. I’m very happy, overall.

Review.Titre: Overall very pleased with the quality…
Review.Contenu: Overall very pleased with the quality and style of the umbrella. My only concern is the runner being made of plastic. My previous umbrella, which I hoped would be of a high quality and last for many years, also had a plastic runner that broke at the latch making it unable to remain closed. My hope with the new product is that it will not suffer the same fate.

Review.Titre: Not 100% what I expected, but I'm keeping it.
Review.Contenu: I can tell by the construction of the umbrella that it is meticulously made. What I'm disappointed about is that I expected a "traditional" umbrella that would lock tight once opened. That loose feeling is not something that I'm used to, but I trust that it will work once the rain comes. Another thing, and I know that I'm nitpicking was the high shipping cost for a very light $50 item. Yet I'm keeping the umbrella, go figure.

I'm going to be very picky, here! The auto-open/push button feature is great. And the push button close. But I have to pull the umbrella all the way down to its locking position before its push button will open again. I like the half size when fully locked&loaded but in&out of the rain, thru a door, into a car, back out again, sometimes you just need a 101% perfect umbrella lol. Delivery was fast. Thank you for a 99.99% perfect umbrella!

Review.Titre: 7/8 chance of getting a good one.
Review.Contenu: One in eight was bad and thus the 4 stars.I have several different devek umbrellas: 1 solo, 5 mini, a Seville and an elite.  All but the Elite are very well made and long lasting.I got a lemon Elite with a piece of aluminum insert came pitted and the metal tip felt off before the first use. The company send me a replacement and a label to return the defective one immediately - so the customer service is very good.

Review.Titre: The travel Davek umbrella is light and…
Review.Contenu: The travel Davek umbrella is light and small, both desirable traits. However it doesn’t open or close easily.  It’s too soon to say whether it’s durable or weather a strong wind will destroy the spokes as is the case with cheaper umbrellas.   Obviously if it’s not durable it’s not worth the price— for five times as much as your standard mini drugstore umbrella.

Review.Titre: I guess the risk one takes when buying…
Review.Contenu: I guess the risk one takes when buying a high-end, expensive umbrella online is that you don't get a sense of how it feels to hold it. My selection, it turns out, is rather heavy. And while it is, technically, a compact, it's much longer than traditional compacts when in the folded position. And I find the strap to be irksome and wish it was removable. That said, it was delivered in a beautiful box and it works well.

Review.Titre: I purchased the combo pack of travel…
Review.Contenu: I purchased the combo pack of travel and mini umbrellas.  Each appear to be sturdily made, very well constructed.  I used the travel in a wind blowing New York City rain storm and it held up well. My only difficulty is closing the umbrella with ease as I am a fairly slight 80 year old.  The mini is small enough to fit into a dress bag.

The Duet umbrella seems very well made, although haven't had a chance to use it in a storm yet, and is the right size for anyone living in a city where wind is a major factor.  However, it is quite a bit heavier than any other umbrella I've owned.  But I'm sure that's why it is touted for its durability.....  strength of the frame vs. lighter weight.

Review.Titre: I was very pleased with the efficiency…
Review.Contenu: I was very pleased with the efficiency of their website and shipment.  However, I requested a RED mini umbrella (shown on the packing slip), but a BLACK umbrella was shipped to.  Since I am leaving for a European trip in a few days, there is not enough time to return it and receive a replacement.  I am very disappointed that the incorrect color was shipped.

Pocket-sized umbrellaI bought the small umbrella, which I carry in a pocket in my briefcase. I have no complaints other than it doesn't look quite as good as the photos which were superb.  I'm now waiting to get caught in the rain.  I may consider buying the larger umbrellas for Christmas gifts this year, but they're a little pricey.

Review.Titre: Love the beauty and craftsmanship (but it’s heavy)
Review.Contenu: Love the beauty and craftsmanship. The dimensions are perfect—just the right length and diameter. The only issue is it is significantly heavy. I appreciate the old school craftsmanship of using a single piece of wood, but I believe a carbon fiber shaft inserted into the same wooden handle would make it much lighter.

Solid construction, have not tested in the windTwo minor issues:  Not easily contracted, hoping this eases with use but takes a firm two hands for my wife to foldSecondly, cover does not easily wrap around umbrella, too tight of a fit for ease of use.We purchased two of the small, portable umbrellas

Review.Titre: Love the Umbrella and the functionality …
Review.Contenu: Love the Umbrella and the functionality of it.  I haven't had a chance to use it too much, but I can tell it'll give me years of great use.My only complaint would be that I do wish that the handle was a little larger than it is.  I know the whole idea is to make it as compact as possible, but I think that the handle (with the clip) can kind of make it a bit unwieldy/hard to grip tightly on a windy day.  Other than that it's amazing!

When I received the umbrella, it only opens 75% of the way. I believe its just a defect of mine but i do love the retraction button. Hopefully the lifetime warranty will fix this.  I do wish that the Alert notification on my phone actually provided some sort of “sound” when the connection is lost.

Great umbrella, but found I only got 25% rebate on replacing my lost umbrella.  I would have gotten 50% on a more expensive one.  Since the umbrella price was commensurate with the value, why the lower discount?By the time you added the shipping cost, I paid nearly full price for the replacement.

Great product, but it arrived damaged. Bought the traveler umbrella which has a strap attached to the handle and a small locking hook to secure it to a shoulder bag or purse strap.  The hook was broken, when the umbrella arrived, so I sent it back asking for a replacement.  I'm anticipating delivery of a new one in about two days.

Great colors, mini umbrella was a pain and waste to purchase because it’s not retractable and barley covers you in the rain. It’s a nice conviene size for a small bag but good luck packing it back up without it being all bulky. I use the travel size instead and have no use for the mini. I wish I neve bought it.

Review.Titre: Quality product but took off one star…
Review.Contenu: Quality product but took off one star for customer service.  No live person on weekends when most of us are not working and can take care of personal issues.  I am returning the product because  my arthritic hands make it painful to operate.  Thought mini was also auto open and close (features not easy to see on smart phone).  Reordering next size to get auto feature and one as a gift for daughter.  Not sure how quickly my return will be processed but that will go into the rating for replacement order.

Review.Titre: Customer Service and Knowledge that goes Beyond What You'd Expect
Review.Contenu: When the owner of this company heard that I was disappointed with the product I received, he contacted me.  Through an exchange emails he figured out what I had been displeased with.  He provided me with some education around what made for a truly effective umbrella AND he provided me with an umbrella that satisfied all of my concerns.  These people care about their product and about their customers!  And they back up their care and concern with effective service. i am very pleased.

The Solo is almost perfect, but not quite. My one quibble is the strap at the knob. What is its purpose? It's not long enough to put around your wrist, which is the only reason I would use it. Just wrapping it around two fingers makes a hand incapable of doing much of anything else but hold it. The strap on your Traveler looks designed to put around the wrist, so I don't understand why you wouldn't use the same principle for the Solo,  Great product, though. I love the umbrella's quick-release feature and its sharp looks.

It was a very difficult choice to pick between a blunt umbrella versus a davek umbrella as the blunt umbrella can withstand winds greater than 50 mph wind. In addition, I do feel that the handle is very small compared to the blunt umbrella and consequently was holding the umbrella by the shaft. Both mini and travelers umbrella. I do love the sophisticated look. Perhaps I need to buy either the solo or duet davek umbrella to feel a different handle grip. I look forward to the new models, styles and sophisticated look that davek has to offer.

Quick order fill, nice product, but is over-priced and does not come with a gift box.  When you order 6 of the same item, common sense should dictate that these are to be gifts.  Also, the mini model does not have a push-button to open or close the umbrella.  Order the traveler if you want that feature.

Review.Titre: Quality Umbrellas - Worth the Price / Think Twice on the Mini
Review.Contenu: I have a Davek umbrella that I have been using for the past 2 years and I feel that it's one of the best buys I've made. My friends are jealous when their cheap umbrellas crumple in the wind.This time I got a "mini." It doesn't work as smoothly as my other Davek, and it is just a bit too small to actually protect anything other than the top of my head from rain.The guarantees Davek makes sound good, but who keeps an umbrella registration number hanging around where they can find it? LOL!

These umbrellas are gorgeous, and both the quality and service seem to be excellent. For the price, however, I would wish them to be just slightly larger: the deluxe cane-handled one doesn't keep one completely dry even when the rain is coming straight down. Beautiful accessories, though.

It is a tad small.  I haven’t had to use it yet but it will be my emergency umbrella.  I wanted something small that I could slip into my tote and this will do nicely.  It’s not too heavy either.  I got plum, beautiful rich color and looks well made.  I’m sure CT weather will be fine for it.

Came in 2 days after I ordered. Good packaging. With my visual assessment, it appears to be made of durable good quality materials. I have not tested it yet on a rainy and windy condition. Nothing much fancy. I thought its automatic. Not ideal size for a big. Hopefully its worth the price.

Review.Titre: So far I would say the umbrella is very…
Review.Contenu: So far I would say the umbrella is very good. I have not used it in the rain yet so only time will tell how it performs. It opens well and seems sturdy. I don't use an umbrella that often but I want one that wil work when needed. I like that they are available in bright colors other than traditional black which makes them easier to find.Comments:1) Care must be taken in the manual stage of closing the umbrella. It is too easy to accidentally press the button to open it.2) This is minor and applies to all umbrellas. When closed they are never easey to roll tightly to slip on the cover.

Review.Titre: Great quality. Need to update on the UI a bit.
Review.Contenu: Quality of the construction and materials are top notch.  They changed the carrying case sleeve for the umbrellas from a thick case with a leather trim to something a little more standard, but still high quality.  I've purchased two duets, five solos, and an elite over the past five years and all have been solid.  Tracking order is difficult - emails for shipment are available but finding a tracking number/link is not.  No option to exclude a receipt in the package (I was sending umbrellas as anniversary/retirement gifts).

Where have you been , I mean I have complained that umbrellas today are made of very cheap quality. But When I walked into a shoe store here in Raleigh, NC I immediately spotted high quality. I asked the salesman what was the cost he said $149.00 , I immediately said I want it I challenge you to pursue other accessories other than bags, and wallets. You just found a permanent lifetime buyer, and I am going to refer your name  many times to prospective buyers. There is a saying seek and you shall find well another dream of mines came true. Much success as I know you will !!!!

OK, I  confess to having problems with the Traveler model; that's the reason for only 4 stars. BUT here's the rub: the customer service was terrific. No quibbling about my issues and a prompt response to my emailed complaint have made me a believer in the company.  I've always believed that nobody's perfect but how the "imperfection" is handled says far more to me about a company than the fact an imperfection occurred. And it is clear from other reviews that Davek umbrellas are topnotch. Once I get my replacement, I am sure I will be writing a 5 star review!

Review.Titre: I love all 3 umbrellas I ordered
Review.Contenu: I love all 3 umbrellas I ordered. The only issue was that a spoke on the Traveler broke the first time I used it. I notified Customer Service and they responded immediately and said this was VERY unusual. They remedied the issue immediately and sent a brand new replacement unit.

Review.Titre: Priced for perfection, but not designed for it
Review.Contenu: The DAVEK DUET is a quality umbrella to be sure, but probably not worth the price. The leather loop which connects the handstrap to the umbrella is designed in such a way that it will crease whenever the handstrap is being used properly; i.e. when the strap is in hand and the umbrella is suspended below. The only time it won't crease is when the handstrap is laying alongside the length of the umbrella, which is only good if you don't store it hanging. This creasing will shortly result in that leather looking very worn, even while the umbrella is relatively new.

Review.Titre: I bought the smallest model as I wanted…
Review.Contenu: I bought the smallest model as I wanted to keep it in my briefcase.  It has the manual opening feature and frankly is hard to open.  While the quality seems good it does not seem like it is that noticeably nicer than a $10:umbrella I can buy elsewhere.

Product is the best, but my 2 very expensive umbrellas shipped to me in a very flimsy box and one end had broken out and was open.  surprised that both umbrellas didn't fall out.  need more durable shipping packaging.

Review.Titre: Would have given 5 stars, but for ...
Review.Contenu: Love the style and the quality. I would have given 5 stars but the mini (I bought the combo pack) didn’t have a button for opening the umbrella. Have arthritis flare-ups and a button would obviously make this easier to open for me.

Beautiful, and beautifully made. Opens easily and collapses when I push the button. I just wish it didn’t take so much strength to pull it back in. It’s a little hard for an old lady with tiny hands!😆 But I will never fear another rainstorm!

Marketing seem to convey that the umbrellas are from New York, but they are actually made in China. Not so much an issue about where it is made, but I actually chose Davek over Knipps because I was of the impression that it was assembled where it was founded.

Review.Titre: I was gifted the mini Davek because $50 …
Review.Contenu: I was gifted the mini Davek because $50 is way too much for me to spend on an umbrella, especially a tiny one. I took it on a month long backpacking trip to Western Europe and it was light to carry. It doesn't seem super sturdy but the website says it is. It didn't break during my trip when I used it or packed it, so time will tell. I had a really hard time finding it in person to avoid the hefty shipping fee. All of the retailers listed on the Davek website say they don't carry Davek and have never heard of the company. Their website desperately needs updating.

Review.Titre: You can really tell the quality with…
Review.Contenu: You can really tell the quality with it's umbrella. I have not had the chance to use it yet. My only reason for giving it 4 stars and I have not put it's to the real world test and it's difficult to get it back into its sleeve.

love the umbrella, which is made of high quality steel and beautifully engineered.  My only issue is that it has a leather strap for carrying, and the strap won't let me open  the  umbrella left handed.    Otherwise it is perfect and well worth the money.

Review.Titre: Love the mini umbrella but was…
Review.Contenu: Love the mini umbrella but was surprised that there weren't any instructions included on how to use it. Also, I was expecting something in writing concerning the lifetime warranty etc...

Very nice umbrella and amazing craftsmanship. There were a  few things missing which Davek should have provided for an umbrella of this quality and price. The canopy was very wrinkled and it was not shipped in a protective box of any kind. It was only covered in plastic which was a let down. I was expecting a perfectly ironed canopy in a nice high quality box. It would be nice to have a protective box to store this inside if traveling or just for general protection. Davek should really look at how Swaine Adeney Brigg presents their umbrellas if they want to sell one of this quality.

Review.Titre: Solid umbrella, but not 5x better than others.
Review.Contenu: Solid umbrella.  Handle a bit awkward with a clip.  Other umbrellas have more ergonomic handles.  I bought one and will carry it.  If you have money to burn and you want a heavier feel to your umbrella, go for it.  Really not different then a good 25$ umbrella.

Product meets expectations. Delivery was faster than quoted. A bit pricey in my opinion, but would still rather pay than have a product that doesn't perform, especially in an umbrella.Would consider future purchases.

Review.Titre: Amazing that one tiny umbrella can…
Review.Contenu: Amazing that one tiny umbrella can accomplish all it does. Well made, easy to store in a briefcase or handbag, it is ready to use on a moments notice.I’m very pleased with my Davek umbrella and have purchased some for gifts.

The umbrella (Davek Savile, Black) is simply made, which is a good thing. The mechanisms involve few moving parts and appear sturdy. Some of the metal bits clipped on to the wooden frame (such as the cap on the end of the umbrella) feel a little loose, but nevertheless strong. The heft is good. The canopy is of a strong, heavy canvas. The wood is comfortable to the hands. The only improvements I would suggest are extending the crook so that the umbrella might be hung over one's shoulder, and tightening up the metal a bit. Overall, a fine piece. The most valuable part by far is the unconditional lifetime warranty.

Excellent umbrella though I think the price is a little too premium even for a luxury item. Has held up well so far in NYC storms but it'll need to hold up for at least a year before it becomes more worthwhile than my usual throwaway umbrellas.

I like the umbrellas I ordered but I don’t think the price is worth the price tag. Maybe because of the lifetime warranty but the cost is almost as much as a designer umbrella. I got 2 mini umbrellas & the golf umbrella. Spent over $200.

Build quality is fantastic. The size of the solo is perfect for carrying around. My only complaint is the auto open doesn't open the umbrella all the way and needs a little help locking open. All in all I'm very happy with my purchase.

Nice umbrella - solid workmanship and so far no complaints. I think the fancy red box that the umbrella is packed in is unnecessary though - I'd rather the money for that goes into R&D and/or into lowering the overall price.

The umbrella looks and feels great. Quality parts are evident above and under the canopy. The Duet does have one small design flaw; the team could have designed a better way to anchor the leather velcro name strap once the umbrella is open -- it just hangs there off of one end (hopefully it does not produce a weak point in high winds). They could have added another piece of velcro where the name strap could be attached properly on the umbrella canopy. It would look more professional and it would clearly advertise the umbrella and its company without someone having to contort themself into another dimension. Very pleased with the purchase regardless.

Review.Titre: I go the Davek alert model to prevent …
Review.Contenu: I got the Davek alert model to prevent loss. It's perfect! The only problem is that the alarm notification on your cell phone is activated by delay when you leave the umbrella.so if you leave it on a bus, you might realize too late!!

Frankly, I haven't needed to use it yet, so my four-star rating results from the heft and feel of the product along with it's sturdy well-built box...but stops short of five stars due to price, which seems excessive.

Review.Titre: I love both the umbrellas I have from…
Review.Contenu: I love both the umbrellas I have from Davek,  however, the larger one's button works kinda hard....and they are really not that large. But you get a fabulously engineered piece of equipment.These are very nice umbrellas. -jr

I just got this umbrella so it's hard to rate it at the moment.  It's a beautifully made umbrella with a little style if you get one with a colored panel.  I hope it'll hold up to all the rain and wind we get here in NYC.

Review.Titre: I haven’t opened my umbrella yet…
Review.Contenu: I haven’t opened my umbrella yet because it hasn’t rained. It is very compact so I hope that it is big enough. The color is great. I gave one to my ex-spouse because it came with a lifetime warranty, unlike our marriage. :-D

Review.Titre: I haven’t used my second to smallest…
Review.Contenu: I haven’t used my second to smallest new purchase. I need a light weight travel umbrella and this is the highest rated. I would enjoy giving it 5 stars, but until I use it later this month, I can’t honestly do that.

Review.Titre: I had been looking at these umbrellas …
Review.Contenu: I had been looking at these umbrellas since I saw them on either 20/20 or 60 minutes a year of so ago. Really feel in love with the Saville. Classic, elegant, technologically amazing. Why I gave 4 stars was because after finally ordering the Saville. I order it on a Friday didn't hear or get an email as to when to expect my package. I called and received the tracking. My $350 umbrella was left outside the front door in plain sight. Then opening the UPS box, I was thinking that the umbrella would be incased a beautiful box and tissue. Rather surprised it was just wrapped in plastic. I was so excited to finally getting a Davek umbrella just a little lack luster.

These umbrellas are extremely well made, but the solo was just a little smaller than I wanted. I admit, I should have paid closer attention to the specs provided. I'll get another one but for now I'm returning the solo.
As the name infers, pretty small coverage area, but mechanically sound. Ordered plum, true to online color. Pretty happy, need a larger companion umbrella w automatic opennow.
Great quality and very convenient size and weight. It is a little bit smaller than I like, but it will work for travel and those "surprise" down pours.I have purchased another for a friend!

the experience in general was very good, unfortunately some quality details in the bag that I bought prevent me from better qualifying the experience ... in any way thank you very much and see you soon

Review.Pseudo: Non frequent umbrella user before purchase
Review.Contenu: So far so good. I had trouble finding the color/model I wanted at retail stores.Used it a few times during strong wind conditions and it held up well. Hopefully it will stand the test of time.
Great mini umbrella.  Not so great order packing department.  Ordered two umbrellas, only received one.  Had to follow up in order for second one to be shipped (which arrived immediately):
I own both Solo and Mini and it is still in good condition despite acquiring this way back 2007. I hope the company would offer more variety of colors to choose from. Especially for the Duet.

I purchased the Traveler umbrella in the red color.  The umbrella came in a timely manner and was well packaged.  The umbrella was heavier than other ones that I own, so it might not be as welcome to put in your luggage with strict weight limits on airlines.  The color was nice, and the umbrella operated fine with the button; you push it once to open and then once again to close.  The only issue that I have is that it was soooooo difficult to pull/push the umbrella closed so that it would lock in a down position.  The first four or five times that I tried, I could not get the umbrella to lock down.  I thought that there was a defect in the locking mechanism, but I was finally able to get the umbrella to lock in the down position.  I don't know if I'll be happy trying to struggle with locking the umbrella when traveling!

Review.Titre: Order was easy, better umbrella cover needed
Review.Contenu: Process of ordering was easy. I would like a better umbrella cover. One that is water proof and covers the entirely of the umbrella, as opposed to the one end being open,.exposing the handle.
Obviously a well constructed umbrella. Not quite large enough to keep the rain completely out as I learned on my first rainy day, but still very nice. it seems to open a bit slowly.
Made very well, lifetime warranty is a plus. Wish the handle was a little bigger on the one I purchased. It would feel more secure in windy conditions.
Packaging impressive and the umbrella looks durable. It hasn’t rained since getting it but I don’t see any problem with it and if there’s any the warranty is lifetime.... I like that.

Review.Titre: Make the handle lighter and it's a perfect travel umbrella.
Review.Contenu: I bought the davek mini travel umbrella. I was a little disappointed to see how heavy the handle was because it could be a much lighter travel umbrella without the heavy metal handle.

1 star review. Horrible customer experience. I received one as a Christmas present and wanted to make an exchange for a different color. I had to pay to ship it back (they don't offer any return label and I had to pay to ship it back). After not having heard or received anything from them I called them. The lady on the other line took care of it promptly and sent me my replacement which I received a couple days later -- it is defective and doesn't open all the way. Shortly thereafter, I get an email saying that before they can ship my replacement (not realizing they had already sent it to me) I would need to pay more money. I emailed them telling them I've already received it and the poor experience I received. They responded back apologizing and word-for-word wrote "Since you have already received your new unit the shipping fee has been waived."

Review.Titre: To be honest hasn't rained since I…
Review.Contenu: To be honest hasn't rained since I bought it. Did open up the umbrella to check how it is made and I was not disappointed. Check back when it rains in the Boston area

Review.Titre: Have not used it all that much, but
Review.Contenu: Have not used it all that much, as the rain slowed down after I got it. But I am pleased with their quality and construction. I hope to enjoy it for a long time coming.
I received the umbrella and bonus travel umbrella. Haven’t used them yet as it hasn’t rained! The larger one seems VERY heavy. Not sure I will keep it.

Review.Titre: The operation is not as smooth as I was…
Review.Contenu: The operation is not as smooth as I was expecting, as you push up you feel the different stages of the opening process. I also thought it had automatic opening.
Umbrella is great.  Would give 5 stars if it was better value for money.  EXPENSIVE!  You can probably get an equally good umbrella for far less money.  Overpriced.
Had a little trouble at first with obtaining the product I wanted but in the end, customer service was helpful. Nice product. Very expensive. I hope I do not lose it!

Review.Titre: I purchased the Davek Solo and used it…Exceeded My Expectations
Review.Contenu: I purchased the Davek Solo and used it this morning during 50 mph wind gusts to see if it would live up to its claims.  I walked two blocks to my office and no one else dared to put up their umbrella.  I made it to my destination and the umbrella stood up to its claims.  It did not turn inside out!

Review.Titre: The umbrellas are really what I…
Review.Contenu: The umbrellas are really what I expected. I bought one Davek commuter and one Davek mini umbrella. They are really sturdy and lightweight. Fits my tote bag perfectly! I just don’t know if they have UV protection features. Would be great if they have. Does anybody know if they do have anti-UV features? Thank you very much!

I wanted to gift my daughter a quality umbrella. I’ve purchased Davek umbrella in the past.  So, i did not have any hesitation with this product.  Ordering thru the website is so easy. I’m sure she’ll enjoy for many seasons.

The umbrellas are individually packed in a very classy and great quality box/package. The umbrella is also of great quality with regards to material and craftsmanship. These will make great Christmas gifts for my adult children.

Review.Titre: Impressive and substantial umbrella no rain tested yet.
Review.Contenu: I received the umbrella the day after a day of rain. I have not had rain and have not used it yet. It is a substantial umbrella and the weight was surprising. I don’t know the intended purpose of a clip on the handle. It won’t attach to a belt.

Review.Titre: The Umbrella's are the best I have ever…
Review.Contenu: The Umbrella's are the best I have ever owned. Extremely durable and well built and stylish. Delivery is quick and communication throughout the process was outstanding,

Love the mini, it is so easy to carry and use during drizzly long walks, very lightweight and not a burden. I also got the Solo. The button is a little hard to operate, especially when my fingers are cold, but it provides good coverage, and I like that the website points out that if it inverts, you can press that button and it will pop back into shape!
This is my second Davek umbrella (I wanted to try a bigger one). I love them so much! They last literally forever and never break.

Davekny.com is easy to order and if you call the store,  the ladies that answer are always kind & helpful. I recently purchased a “DUET”. I also have a solo. They truly are the best umbrellas. Highly recommend. Considering the inflation they are not expensive when you realize they will last forever if used for the intended use.

Review.Titre: The umbrella is high quality which is…
Review.Contenu: The umbrella is high quality which is what I was looking for. Also like the lifetime warranty.

Review.Titre: You probably won't need to use the Warranty, but if you do...
Review.Contenu: First off - these umbrellas are built like tanks - to last and perform!  How it broke on my is a question I'm not sure of, but things happen.  The warranty coverage was the BEST experience I have ever had with a consumer brand. (even better than APPLE!).  A quick replacement, easy to work with and I'm back to staying dry in the rain again!  Superb, well done Davek!!
Gave this to my brother as a gift for getting his dream job. He absolutely loved it.
Quality and craftsmanship of these luxury umbrellas are unmatched. Thank You

Review.Titre: I decided to purchase another umbrella…
Review.Contenu: I decided to purchase another umbrella when my very old Davek umbrella started showing its age. I would notbuy any other brand because my old umbrella worked so well for so many years. I keep it in the car along with the tiny Davek that I also purchased this time for surprise showers.

Great little umbrella. I bought this for a trip to Italy when rain was in the forecast almost every day. It worked very well. It was sturdy in the bad weather and then folded up nicely for when it wasn’t needed. I carried it in my interior jacket pocket and barely felt it. The umbrella also shipped very quickly!

Review.Titre: Davek Umbrellas has awesome customer service!
Review.Contenu: I was blown away by Davek Umbrellas' customer service. I emailed about a minor issue with my new umbrella. They responded in a couple of minutes asking a thoughtful question to help clarify the issue. They immediately provided a great solution. It's rare to see companies today who truly understand how to deliver customer service and Davek sets a great standard here.
Product quality is great, the ordering process was easy. I bought several for gifts. FYI, the commuter fits well in my car door pocket. Solo is the flagship and worth it, we use to block sun as well.

I like the umbrella. It looks like it'll be perfect for me. What I didnt like was the FedEx driver leaving my package outside of my apartment building. I live downtown. I'm not going to order from anywhere that uses FedEx anymore.
Great quality and customer service.  I forgot my 10% discount, sent them an email and they responded right away that they will refund 10% on my order as soon as it was processed

I have 3 umbrellas already and decided to buy on for my aunt. Their product is well made. Mine lasted a very long time, over 10 years and when a brace broke it was replaced immediately. So, THANK YOU!

Thank you Davek. After approximately 10 years , I had my umbrella pinched while I was shopping. An absolute heart break. Thank G-d for the warranty. I received my new Solo Davek as promised quickly. Davek truly are quality umbrellas. I plan to come back snd get the Duet. 😁

I took this tiny umbrella on a 14 day visit to the rainforests and beaches of Costa Rica. Because of the small size I was able to carry it in the back pocket of my shorts or in my sling bag. Although I used it three times for rain, it was most valuable as a parasol against the blazing sun. This tiny umbrella has joined the list of "vital" items on my packing list.
Umbrellas are great and the ordering and shipping went well. I can't think of anything they could do better.

So far so good.  It is as attractive, compact and useful as advertised.  My problem is that I keep losing them, but I like them enough to keep replacing them.  I'm on my third now.  The first didn't make it back from The Bahamas.  I'm hoping someone down there is enjoying it. And then I went to a historical lecture locally with a bunch of well-heeled attendees during a rain storm.  We all dutifully left our wet umbrellas outside.  Sure enough someone one took mine...like they had a Davek too!  They left me with some no-name, black and manual (like mine) one that literally broke the next day as the rain continued.  I'll be sure to be on the lookout at the next rainy event.  Well, I must say from experience that I don't have to wait long for them to be delivered.  I also like those nice bags that they come in.  I have three.

Lightweight. Perfect fit for my bag. Quick to open and close as rain came and went and as I wandered in and out of different structures. Especially loved the stand-out pink color. Appreciate the details - leather strap, wooden handle. Easily convinces me to start an umbrella collection!

Review.Titre: Superior build quality compared to other umbrellas.
Review.Contenu: Davek New York umbrellas packaged the product very well. it came in a nice umbrella box. Build quality and materials used. Built-in tracking device & easy to follow instructions, absolutely awesome!!! They in the umbrella business hands down. Expensive! "You get what you paid for".

This company is exceptional. My trusty Davek (the Duet) developed a wonky spoke after several years of excellent service against the British weather. I followed the instructions on the website and within days a brand new one arrived; all I had to pay was postage. I didn't think such fantastic customer service still existed but Davek proved me wrong.

Review.Titre: The Return Process Was Very Easy
Review.Contenu: Ordered an umbrella for my wife, but alas, she didn't like it because it was too small.  Anyways, the return process was really easy and I have already received my credit.I was pretty impressed with the quality of the product, though, so I will probably order another one later.

Davek umbrellas are well-made and dependable and won’t self-destruct in the first tempest. While I’m a proud owner of a James Smith & Sons, and plan to add soon both Brigg and Michel Heurtault umbrellas to my rotation, when the sky threatens rain, I’m most apt to grab my Davek Duet: without doubt an umbrella of extraordinary utility.

So easy to place an order without difficulty.   Orders arrive promptly, well packaged and damage free.  I contacted customer service before placing my order as I really wanted the yellow umbrella.   I was reassured of its beauty.  My Solo and I make a great team.. surviving 1.65 miles together in the rain and wind. Best rainy day ever!

Great and fast shipping for being delivered across the country. Unfortunately, I missed the rain in CA by a day so haven’t had a real world test. But the quality is exceptional and I’d really feel I bought the first and last 2 umbrellas I’d ever need in life. Purchased the Duet and DAVEK Elite ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Umbrella is amazing, but had a flaw that should have been caught. That said, a replacement was immediately sent with a return shipping label, so all is well. Umbrella is a tad on the heavy side for it's size, I'll stick to keeping it in the car and carry my Blunt umbrella for international travel.

My first davek umbrella is almost 10 year old. It experienced London and NYC wind and rain storms but still in good condition. I love it. Just purchased same umbrella in a different color. Easy to carry, and looks elegant

Great quality umbrellas, good customer service, prompt delivery time. I have bought several umbrellas from davek and know im getting an umbrella that will last the test of time. Will continue ordering from this company. Like the lifetime guarantee too .

I bought one of these umbrellas for my husband last year and he loves it. My old umbrella broke so David suggested a Davek umbrella because they are the best and the company will replace it if I lose it or if it breaks. But that’s doubtful! These umbrellas are so strong. They don’t fold-up in high wind like other umbrellas. I love the lavender stripe in mine. David has the pretty blue. The price is worth it. Thank you DAVEK!

Review.Titre: We have been using our Davek umbrellas…
Review.Contenu: We have been using our Davek umbrellas for several months now and love how robust and well finished they are. They so far resisted without flipping every bit of New York weather subjected them to

Review.Titre: I purchased a Davek umbrella for…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a Davek umbrella for durability, styling, and lifetime warranty. Recently, I had to have my umbrella repaired/replaced and the process could not have been simpler. Their Customer Service was prompt and courteous in response to my issue and a replacement was sent to my home within twenty-four hours of my claim. Thank you, Davek

Review.Titre: Great quality and I love my two Golf…
Review.Contenu: Great quality and I love my two Golf umbrellas!Watching for a great deal on the standard, more compact personal ones next and possibly the loss prevention gizmos too.

Davek’s umbrellas quickly appeared in my search results for high quality, rugged, long lasting umbrellas. I will take care of my new umbrella and expect that it’s built quality will provide me the protection I need for years to come. Oh, and with style.

Love the coverage on the solo and the compactness of the travel umbrella. Love how the solo pops open with the press of a button. Ordering these new special umbrellas is all it took to get the sun to come out (haha :-)  I did get to use some borrowed ones on a very rainy trip last June.  Went for long walks in the rainy forest and really enjoyed these classy umbrellas!

I purchased a Davek umbrella over 5 years ago. I was initially sceptical about the lifetime guarantee. The tiny mini umbrella I purchased has proved to be such good value for money. Last week we had very strong winds - so strong that the shaft of the umbrella hit me in the face whilst I felt like I myself was being blown away, before the umbrella flipped inside out and finally broke. I remembered about the lifetime guarantee and contacted Davek. I sent them a picture of the broken umbrella, they asked me to pay a shipping fee and sent me a new umbrella. The service was excellent and this company really keeps its promise.

The Terminator of umbrellas, Davek's are bad to the bone. Reliable, sturdy, stylish, and solid. Makes we want more rain. And if a terminator needed an umbrella, I got money says they'd roll Davek.  Don't mess.

Review.Titre: The order was quick and straightforward.
Review.Contenu: The umbrellas arrived at the other coast within a few days. Not only did we get the mini umbrellas, but also two stuff bags to keep them more protected.
Fast turnaround. I’m rarely without my Davek mini so I was happy that after having sent it in over a long holiday weekend I received a replacement my first day back in the office.

Review.Titre: They sell products that they vouch for…
Review.Contenu: They sell products that they vouch for no more no less. When they say, it's sturdy, durable, dependable and classy you better believe it. It should be a part of an executive outfit just saying.
Great quality product, performs as exactly as expected against rain, wind, and mobility. Very fast shipping too :)

My original Davek umbrella was stolen, so I used the one-time replacement program offered by Davek. Fortunately I still had the replacement code.  The ordering process was simple.  Using the code was also a straightforward process.  I got the new umbrella within a few days and it was wrapped in a very sturdy box.  I have always loved my Davek umbrella and the replacement program made it simple to continue to tradition.

Review.Titre: I ordered yellow mini umbrella for…
Review.Contenu: I ordered yellow mini umbrella for gift.The person I purchased it for wanted a yellow umbrella.Unfortunately the umbrella was more of an orange colour. However the umbrella was very light & made beautifully.I contacted Davek & they provided full refund no questions asked.Excellent customer service.Refund provided promptly.
We love Davek umbrellas. We were at a rainy music festival weekend with friends and they were so impressed with our Daveks that we decided to gift them for their birthdays.

Review.Titre: By far the highest quality umbrella…
Review.Contenu: By far the highest quality umbrella I’ve ever owned.  We have 4 of them some that are 15 years old.  They stand behind their warranty.  The Golf umbrella is sensational!  Keep doing what you’re doing!  Really a fan !

Review.Titre: What makes my experience so great customer service, you actually get to a live person without being on hold !
Review.Contenu: What makes my experience so great, the umbrella broke no hassles at all, sent the picture received a new umbrella. Customer service excellent!
Very nice umbrella. I purchased it for the rainy doggie walks. Haven’t put it to the test yet . It’s bit heavier then other ones but the quality is very impressive.

When I ordered the umbrella, I received a prompt acknowledgement of my order, and follow-up emails to advise of product shipment and delivery. The umbrella arrived as committed. It was a present for my wife, who was completely impressed by its quality and ease of use. Thank You

Review.Titre: This is my 2nd purchase from Davek
Review.Contenu: This is my 2nd purchase from Davek. Upon buying the first one, they gave me a discount on my 2nd purchase. Super happy with their product.

Review.Titre: Received umbrella and in record time
Review.Contenu: Received umbrella and in record time.  Umbrella appears very well made.  I have not had a chance to try it out as we are awaiting more rain.  However, this Davek umbrella replaces an umbrella that blew inside out during a windy rain a short time ago!

When I placed my order, I ordered the wrong color. I quickly contacted your support help and was able to change my order to the right color' before my order was shipped.   My wife and I are very pleased with our umbrellas.

First time customer.  My rating/review is for the initial ordering and delivery.   It has stopped raining so I have not used the umbrellas.In need of an umbrella, my search yielded DavekNY.  After reading the reviews (and being the 1st time), I decided to order the mini and the commuter.  The website is very informative and easy to use.  After ordering on March 20, I received same day confirmation.  March 21, I received notice of shipping.  March 27, both umbrellas arrived.Packaging was undisturbed.  No outside damage.  Inside, I could tell that care was given for the West Coast shipping.  The mini arrived in it's sleeve.  The commuter arrived in a classy box. No damage at all. I'm impressed with the entire ordering process thru delivery. The umbrellas look to well made. I don't believe I will be disappointed once the next storm hits. I do recommend.

Davek’s website was clear and concise, the ordering process straightforward, with timely and informed delivery, and the umbrella’s were packed with extreme care. I’ll get to try out the umbrella’s soon, as more rain is coming!

Review.Titre: So glad I finally bit the bullet and…
Review.Contenu: So glad I finally bit the bullet and purchased one of these umbrellas! Absolutely in love with the pure quality in every detail, and the way water doesn’t stick to it. I love the rain even more now, thank you!

Review.Titre: I have been using my umbrella for over…4 years
Review.Contenu: I have been using my umbrella for over 4 years now and it happened to break which i was surprised about, with a quick photo and minimal shipping cost, a new one was sent to me, will forever use this company! BEST umbrellas BEST service. thank you Davek

I have used several umbrellas over last 15 years.  They are quality and durable in design and use.  They are not oversized for cumbersome use.  The reason I have used several over the years is due to leaving and losing  them.  I always reorder for my use.  Good umbrellas!

My family now has several Davek umbrellas. We love them because they are compact, sturdy and stylish. Sadly, two of them recently broke. Happily, Davek customer service replaced them, incredibly quickly. We're delighted to recommend Davek.

Review.Titre: I purchased the Davek Elite and also…
Review.Contenu: I purchased the Davek Elite and also the travel size. Wow what an amazing umbrella. No way this thing will break under normal use or with high winds. You have to purchase one to see for yourself. Absolutely worth the extra money.
