The overall experience was straightforward and delightful. I received my shipments promptly and they were nicely presented/packaged. I had a hard time figuring out the size I needed - ended up buying the solo (too small but kept it as a back-up), bought the golf umbrella instead (too big! but I returned it and the return process was very simple and I was promptly refunded), and then bought the Duet (I think that is the name) and this umbrella is just right, as Goldilocks would say. So, I have had three purchase experiences with Davek in the last week, and all made me feel valued as a customer. The size issue on the umbrellas is more an issue I have with conceptualizing measurements vs a product description issue, but maybe a video showing the product in use by humans on the website could be helpful to understand size/operability better. Very happy with this brand and company.

Review.Titre: Well quality is easy to recognize
Review.Contenu: Well quality is easy to recognize. First off it's not cheap money wise; also the company has a great customer service. Davic has both. Thank you . Great work will never go unnoticed
Great service.  The quality of the umbrellas is tops.  As someone who not infrequently loses these things, however, the replacement service is exceptional.

Review.Titre: I own several Davek umbrella models
Review.Contenu: I own several Davek umbrella models, and they are all of excellent quality and durability. As for the company, the customer service is very alert and understanding, and follows through on issues. Overall, worth the price and peace of mind.

Review.Titre: It was easy to select the model I…
Review.Contenu: It was easy to select the model I wanted and purchase it online.  (In the past I've purchased them in a local, independent store.) The umbrella arrived quickly.

This is my second Davek umbrella. I LOVE your products. The smaller one I first purchased is as good as new and I've had it several years. It's great for keeping in the car. I wanted the new one for walking my dog when it rains and for other general times of need. I LOVE IT! Your umbrellas are so well made - worth every penny!
Quick delivery of our order. After receipt our review of your product confirmed quality goods that we anticipate to last a long time.

Review.Titre: Quick delivery and just the umbrella I…
Review.Contenu: Quick delivery and just the umbrella I need for travel. Small and compact… it will fit in my pocket!I have installed the electronic device to alert me should I ever walk off and leave it somewhere.Can’t wait till the next rainy day!

Review.Titre: Great for travel and every day.
Review.Contenu: Love these! We have four, two live in our travel bags, the other in our car and one at home to grab in a hurry. They literally fit in your pocket or a pocketbook/tote but work as well as the big boys.
Shipping was fast and easy, great quality and vibrant color.

Review.Titre: We bought different sizes of davek and…
Review.Contenu: We bought different sizes of davek and we love them all. Durable and nice quality. We are giving our family and friends this umbrella as a gift and they love it too.
Received my order quickly!  Nicely packed and so compact for my work bag.   Love my new umbrella.   Great gift idea for the travelers in your life!
Excellent quality.  Very rigid and sturdy.  Quite pleased with this umbrella.

Review.Titre: Have not had to use the umbrella yet…
Review.Contenu: Have not had to use the umbrella yet but did open/close. Vert good quality. You can feel and see how well made it is.  Won’t fall apart like other popular name brands do after one season.
Good quality umbrella and efficient delivery. This is my fourth umbrella. I have given as gifts

Review.Titre: Perfect umbrella why not have both sizes!
Review.Contenu: I already own the large umbrella and wanted a small purse size and because my Davek has been the best umbrella I have ever owned I ordered the small one. It came on time and exactly as pictured. I have used it already and it performed perfectly. I love my new umbrella and so happy I ordered it.
This is my 3rd Davek…..my experience has been that this umbrella has tremendous durability.  I have been pretty happy with it

Review.Titre: Love the high quality Davek products
Review.Contenu: Love the high quality Davek products! They’re worth the investment and I won’t be throwing out umbrellas every year now.

Review.Titre: I sent a Davek to my sister
Review.Contenu: I sent a Davek to my sister for her birthday as it is the most reliable and attractive umbrella I have. She loved it and I hope gets many years of use.

Review.Titre: I loved receiving the free umbrella…
Review.Contenu: I loved receiving the free umbrella with my purchase. I especially loved receiving the discount on the mini umbrella. I take it everywhere.

Review.Titre: I have purchased two Savek Sevile in…
Review.Contenu: I have purchased two Savek Sevile in navy blue. Both to give to special people in my life. This is the perfect gift for someone who admires beauty and exquisite craftsmanship. Thank you.
What a beautiful and quality travel umbrella. I am going to enjoy carrying this on my next trip.

Review.Titre: Great experience from start to finish
Review.Contenu: Great experience from start to finish! Ordering was simple, delivery smooth and prompt. The product is well made.

Review.Titre: I got Duet and Mini umbrella
Review.Contenu: I got Duet and Mini umbrella. They are good at looking and function. Mini one had a defect and I emailed. Davek replied right away and they shipped new one. I amazed with their service. I strongly recommend Davek even the prices are high. It worth. Thumbs up.

Review.Titre: Purchased the mini...easy to carry in…
Review.Contenu: Purchased the mini...easy to carry in my trouser pocket....started raining at the parade...didn't have to get wet...thanks to the compact mini.
Solid and protective. The larger umbrellas are a bit heavy so my husband loves his.

Review.Titre: I shopped online and the delivery was…
Review.Contenu: I shopped online and the delivery was fast. The Davek Umbrellas are one of a kind for their quality and the materials used.
Easy to open and close. Did not blow inside out with strong gusty winds. Comfortable handle. Kept me dry. Highly recommended.MarkNYC
Very solidly made. Quality materials. I have the smaller one that is easier to carry in a pocket. This one is nice getting in and out of a car when it is raining.
I very much like the umbrella I ordered. The ordering process was easy and I received the umbrella exactly as expected.

Review.Titre: Best part about it is my wife LOVES her…
Review.Contenu: Best part about it is my wife LOVES her compact umbrella! Looks very well made and mechanism works smoothly. Delivered on time as stated .
Exceptional umbrella and fast shipping.  If you want a high quality product, Davek is the place.

Review.Titre: It was a gift to my daughter
Review.Contenu: It was a gift to my daughter. She loves her Davek, especially with the tracker. She's in an out of business offices. This is one less thing to keep up with.
One of best umbrellas on the market.  Can handle winds in urban centers.
Best Customer  service ever. I had a Solo that I bought  in 2013 and it just broke. I called  Davek, sent a photo of the umbrella, and they sent me a new one. No questions  asked.
I haven't used the umbrellas that I bought yet, but the packaging and presentation were top notch!
